Job Description:
Job description
Dear Candidate,

Anacle Systems is a Singapore based MNC, having presence in India & provides enterprise application software and energy management system to a strong and diversified customer and end-user base across Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Qatar,
UAE, and other Asian countries. For more details please visit our website :- www.anacle.com

Currently hiring for Firmware Engineer at Pune office.

The details of Job are as below:


Roles and Responsibilities
As a Senior Firmware Engineer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining firmware solutions for embedded systems. You will be responsible for leading firmware development projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality firmware products. Your expertise in low-level programming, hardware integration, and debugging will contribute to the development of cutting-edge firmware solutions.
Responsibilities:
Design, implement, and maintain firmware code using C/C++.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define system architecture.
Integrate firmware with hardware components and peripherals.
Optimize firmware for performance and efficiency.
Conduct testing, debugging, and issue resolution.
Create and maintain technical documentation.
Provide technical guidance and mentorship.
Stay updated with industry trends and innovations.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electronics/Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
Desired candidate Profile:
3-5 yrs of experience in firmware development for embedded systems.
Strong proficiency in low-level programming languages such as C/C++.
Solid understanding of microcontroller architectures, embedded systems, and hardware-software interaction.
Experience with real-time operating systems (RTOS) and device drivers.
Proficiency in debugging tools, such as JTAG debuggers and logic analyzers.
Knowledge of communication protocols (e.g., SPI, I2C, UART) and peripheral interfaces.
Knowledge of networking protocols (e.g., Modbus-TCP, TCP/IP, GSM).
Familiarity with firmware development tools, such as compilers, debuggers, and IDEs.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze complex firmware-related issues.
Excellent teamwork and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Leadership experience or demonstrated ability to lead firmware development projects.
Familiarity with Agile development methodologies is a plus.
As a Senior Firmware Engineer, you will have the opportunity to contribute to the development of innovative products and technologies. Your expertise in firmware development and system integration will play a crucial role in delivering high-quality, reliable, and efficient firmware solutions for cutting-edge embedded systems.
If you have experience & passion to join our team, please apply with your updated cv

Thanks

We are looking for Laravel Developer

Good Experience for PHP and Laravel

Required Experience : 3 to 6 year

Location : Mohali

Looking for Immediate joiner

Job Description :

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Laravel Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have at least 3 years of experience working with Laravel, and a strong understanding of PHP web development.

Responsibilities :

- Develop and maintain web applications using Laravel framework

- Design and implement complex database structures and queries to support application functionality, including experience with high-load and high-traffic projects

- Optimize application performance and scalability using caching mechanisms, indexing and other database optimization techniques

- Write high-quality, maintainable, and testable code

- Work collaboratively with designers, project managers, and other developers to meet project requirements and deadlines

- Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members

- Research and implement new technologies and techniques to improve development processes and application performance, including experience with serverless architectures, microservices, and containerization

- Develop custom solutions and integrations with third-party APIs and services, such as payment gateways, messaging services, and social media platforms

- Design and develop RESTful APIs and implement integrations with front-end frameworks

- Familiarity with deployment and server management, including experience with SSH, Git, and other version control tools, as well as experience with AWS or other cloud services

- Experience with event-driven architectures and working with asynchronous programming and message queues

- Develop and maintain documentation for applications and systems

Requirements :

- At least 3 years of experience working with Laravel framework

- Strong understanding of PHP web development, including object-oriented programming, design patterns, and best practices

- Strong experience with MySQL databases, including complex database structures, optimization, and query optimization for high-load and high-traffic projects

- Familiarity with Git, SSH, and other version control tools

- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

- Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment

- Good communication skills in English

Job Description:
Job description

Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability status. EEO/AA/M/F/Disabled/Vets

Job Title: Senior Database Administrator
Job Location: Bengaluru, Karnataka
Work Arrangement: Hybrid (3 days per week in office)
Shifts: Rotational Shifts

Job Purpose:
The successful candidate will be a production database administration competency in our News Technology Services - Database Infrastructure team and will take ownership of supporting the NewsCorp affiliate company databases including administration, performance, reliability and security of data in a core database competency.
For this role you will show expertise in one or more Dow Jones core database technologies listed below with an aptitude to develop skills in other core Dow Jones database technologies and assist the team to develop their non-core skills in your core competency.
The MySQL/Aurora Database administrator will need a detailed understanding of the applications supported by his/her core competency and be expected to be proactive in detecting potential issues and to raise any concerns and service improvement suggestions with Offshore Database Manager.
As part of the Database team, the candidate will also offer a wealth of experience across the Enterprise, with knowledge of other Infrastructure technologies such as Windows, Linux, Ethernet and Fiber Channel Networking.
Backup technologies CommVault and NetWorker are a plus.

Accountabilities and Responsibilities
Responsible for, but not limited to, the following;
Database architecture & Design
Performance tuning & Monitoring
HA, Clustering, Replication
Backup Solutions
Amazon AWS Databases
Troubleshooting system and network performance problems
Core competency on MySQL/Aurora/PostgreSQL.
Minimum of 5-7 years of experience working with MySQL, Aurora, MariaDB, Percona databases and/or other databases.
Minimum 4+ years of experience with AWS RDS. (Aurora, MySQL, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB and Redshift etc.)
Should possess strong architecture knowledge and concepts of infrastructure and databases.
Should have reasonable understanding of network, security and access concepts on the cloud (AWS) such as VPC, security groups, NACL s, bastion servers etc.
Should possess strong security concepts and data protection strategies including encryption and fine grained access controls.
Implement proper security and access controls and keep the databases patched for security vulnerabilities.
Should have sufficient knowledge of hardware and software load balancers.
Must be familiar with all replication technology: master- master, master-slave, circular etc.
Should support/Administer i.e. manage, maintain and monitor Aurora databases in AWS and on-prem MySQL databases.
Should have sound knowledge on the Cluster and parameter groups and CLI's.
Perform 24x7 advanced tier troubleshooting, including off hour maintenance and optimization activities, problem resolution, and on-call.
Possess a working knowledge of database internals including locks, waits, transaction consistency, data integrity, recovery paths etc.
Knowledge of containerization such as Docker or Kubernetes and EKS services would be a huge plus.
Must have performed MySQL/Aurora (cloud) database upgrades and patching with minimum downtime (rolling upgrades/patches).
Should have experience in migrating on-prem MySQL databases to RDS using different methods like DMS, Replication etc.
Should have worked directly with developers and engineers to review database models and design, indexes and queries.
Perform database backups and recovery.
Must know techniques of backing up tables, databases, utilities for backup and restoring them to a point-in-time or restore a master.
Design and build Disaster Recovery strategies

Additional Knowledge
Windows & Linux operating systems
Working knowledge of networking, routing and VLANs
Working knowledge of Cloud technologies Amazon Web Services.
Good understanding of Internet based technologies: TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP, and SMTP
Service Management tools ServiceNow.
Understanding of industry leading monitoring tools
Practical experience in monitoring and tuning infrastructure to provide a highly available service
Strong understanding of enterprise architecture, system availability and disaster recovery
Work proactively with 3rd parties to identify opportunities to enhance the service and effectiveness of those Services

Person Specification:
You are a multi-skilled database administrator, preferably with exposure to a variety of database vendors. You also have a broad set of IT skills gained over a minimum 5 years working in an enterprise IT organization. You are experienced in implementing; securing, supporting and upgrading enterprise infrastructure, ensuring the infrastructure, which runs corporate applications, are correctly monitored and highly available as required.
Essential skills
Able to work in a fast paced environment.
Able to demonstrate flexibility, adaptability, motivation, as well as excellent problem solving capability.
Strong time and task management skills
Ideally educated to degree level, with a strong technical and service management background.
ITIL certification or other service management framework experience, including working with ITIL Service processes and functions such as Change, Incident, Problem and Transition.
Strong customer management skills, including the ability to resolve disputes to mutual satisfaction.
Good documentation skills to present in any internal or external technical review forums
Good communication and report writing skills
Additional Requirements:
Ensure effective management of any outsourced services and functions through Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and contracts.
Respond to, and satisfactorily resolve, any escalated customer issues or concerns.
Work with other Technology teams to identify possible service improvements and implement these through the Change Management process.
Responsibility for working with the Service Owners on routine testing of backup, resiliency, and disaster recovery scenarios.
Work successfully with on and off shore team members to provide the best overall working structure.
Participate in a database on-call rotation for both planned work and unplanned service interruptions.

Key Relationships:
Infrastructure team
Service Delivery team
Application/Service Managers
3rd Party Support Partners
Transition Management
Problem Management
Incident Management
Change Management
Vendor Management
Project / Programme Managers

Unusual Challenges/Circumstances:
(e.g. a lot of travel, long or unusual hours of work, cover for others at short notice)
Must be prepared to respond to major incidents relating to infrastructure outages at short notice and outside of normal working hours.
Must be willing to work US EDT hours.
Must be prepared to work very early mornings to cover the change window.

Job Description:
Job description

Develop, code, and optimize quantum algorithms for various quantum computing platforms and architectures.
Collaborate with quantum physicists, mathematicians, and software engineers to translate theoretical concepts into practical quantum applications.
Implement and maintain quantum simulation and quantum programming frameworks.
Conduct rigorous testing and debugging of quantum algorithms to ensure accuracy and performance.
Continuously monitor and evaluate advancements in quantum computing technologies and propose strategies to apply them in projects.
Conduct research to identify novel applications and use cases for quantum computing in fields such as cryptography, optimization, machine learning, and chemistry.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
Mentor and guide junior developers to foster their understanding of quantum computing principles and best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate quantum solutions with classical computing systems.
Present research findings and quantum computing concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Primary Skills
Experience in software development, with a focus on quantum computing.
Strong theoretical knowledge of quantum mechanics and quantum computing principles. Public.
Proven experience in programming languages commonly used in quantum computing, such as Qiskit, Cirq, or Quipper.
Familiarity with quantum algorithm design, optimization, and quantum error correction techniques.
Experience with quantum simulation tools and platforms, such as IBM Quantum, Rigetti Forest, or Microsoft Quantum Development Kit.
Demonstrated ability to develop, test, and optimize quantum algorithms for practical applications.
Solid understanding of classical algorithms and data structures, which are relevant to quantum computing solutions.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a passion for exploring new possibilities with quantum technologies.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to diverse audiences.


Secondary Skills
Research experience in quantum computing and contributions to the quantum computing community (e.g., publications, conference presentations).
Experience with superconducting, trapped ion, or topological quantum computing platforms.
Knowledge of quantum machine learning algorithms and quantum artificial intelligence.
Understanding of quantum cryptography and secure communication protocols.

Job Description:
Job description
Provide technical leadership in development of next generation cryptography systems which are robust, efficient and easy to use.
Provide leadership for organizational cybersecurity architecture meeting organizational and regulatory requirements.
Design and implement cryptographic solutions based on quantum resistant algorithms and protocols as a reusable blocks for usage in applications with minimum efforts.
Develop deeper understanding of PQC algorithms and their implications in protocols and applications to architect, design and implement business solutions across IT and OT systems.
Develop methods, tools and framework to efficiently explore and experiment with PQC algorithms.
Develop PoCs demonstrating the functionality, performance and testing of PQC and related protocols in business applications. Develop systems for benchmarking PQC and hybrid algorithms in such applications / use cases.
Prepare thought leadership through white papers, technical papers, articles, blogs etc.

Primary Skills
Deep understanding and experience with cryptography technologies, primitives, algorithms, PKI systems and certificates.
Hands-on experience with security protocols (OpenSSL, VPN, TLS , IPSec. Etc.), Expertise in cryptography technologies,
Experience with Linux systems, scripting, network performance analysis, cryptography performance benchmarking and debugging capabilities.
Proficiency with multiple programming languages - C/C++, Java, Python and any other relevant programming languages.
Exposure to post quantum cryptography algorithms and their implementations.
Good understanding of cloud platforms and cloud data protection and key management aspects on any/all the leading cloud platforms (AWS, Azure and GCP).
Experience with modern software development lifecycle methodologies.

Secondary Skills
Experience with implementations (open source or commercial) of algorithms, protocols and applications with quantum resistant algorithms
Experience with tools (benchmarking, testing, debugging,..) and frameworks with PQC and their hybrid variants.
Familiarity with security related standards and certifications (NIST, IETF, FIPS 140-2/3 etc..)
Understanding of advanced security/cryptography topics like Zero Trust, SDP, secure multiparty computation, zero-knowledge or homomorphic encryption
Some experience/understanding of threat modelling and analysis of cryptographic systems, side channel attacks, other similar attacks and, associated measures to counter such threats.

Job Description:
Job description
Hello,

Greetings from Acute Informatics Pvt ltd .
We are looking a Server engineer for Our MNC client in Gurgaon . this is permanent opportunity for direct client location .


Purpose and scope
The post-sales Server engineer will be responsible for deploying Server solutions for potential customers, and will have knowledge of the Server infrastructure Which Comprises of Servers, Storage such as SAN and NAS, HCI Infrastructure, Virtualization, Cloud Computing (AWS & Azure), and enterprise server systems such as AD Server, File Server, Antivirus Server, Proxy Server, DLP System, Email System such as Office 365 & MS Exchange, and Backup System such as Veritas, Veeam, EMC ,Acronis and Others. The role requires extensive knowledge of Server topologies and technologies, and demands the ability to develop and maintain strong working relationships with internal and external stakeholders at all levels.
The post-sales engineer will report to the Post sales Team Lead within Engineering division of KDDI India Pvt. Ltd.
Job Duties:
1)Server Engineer will be responsible for deployment of Server hardware (Dell/HP/Lenovo etc.) & storage solution (NAS/SAN e.g... HP MSA, HP 3PAR, IBM Storewise, QLogic etc.)
2)Server Engineer must have good knowledge of Microsoft Active Directory, DFS, Terminal Servers, including troubleshooting skill.
3)Must have experience in deployment of various Backup solution veritas, Veeam, Arcserve, Acronis, Commvault etc.
4)Engineers should be familiar with virtualization software, such as VMware and Hyper-V, scripting with PowerShell
5)Experience of migrating Email service from On-premise Exchange/Postmaster/Zimbra to Google or Microsoft 365 cloud
6)Understanding of patching tools and security vulnerability scanning
7)Engineer must have experience on deploying various Antivirus solutions (TrendMicro/Broadcom /Sophos/CrowdStrike etc) & Proxy/DLP services like websense, ZScaler etc...
8)Engineer with good knowledge of AZURE & AWS and Database would be advantageous
Provide trusted technical advice and assistance to customers and colleagues alike.

If you are interested then please please help me following details to process.

Job Description:
Job description
Provide Support Services to our enterprise customers using our flagship CDP Public Cloud platform. This may include assistance provided during the engineering and operations of distributed cloud systems as well as responses for mission-critical systems and production customers.
Demonstrate the ability to actively listen to customers and show empathy to the customer s business impact when they experience issues with our product.
Participate in the queue management and coordination process by owning customer escalations, managing the unassigned queue and assigning cases to COEs
Be involved with and work on other support related activities
Triage, diagnose and escalate customer inquiries when applicable during their engineering and operations efforts
Collaborate and share solutions with both customers and Clouderans
Investigate product related issues both for particular customers and for common trends that may arise
Study and understand critical system components and large cluster operations
Differentiate between issues that arise in operations, user code, third party libraries or product
Coordinate enhancement and feature requests with product management and Cloudera engineering
Participate in occasional weekend on-call roster for critical support needs
Participate as a designated or dedicated engineer for specific customers. Aspects of this engagement translates to building long term successful relationships with customers, leading weekly status calls, and occasional visits to customer sites
We re excited about you if you have:
Solid skills in troubleshooting to repair failed products or processes on a machine or a system using a logical, systematic search for the source of a problem in order to solve it, and make the product or process operational again
A strong ability to understand the feelings of our customers as we empathize with them on the issue at hand
A strong desire to increase your product and technology skillset; increase- your confidence supporting our products so you can help our customers succeed
You may also have:
Experience in Hadoop cluster installation, upgrades, and migrations.
Experience in installing, upgrading, and administrating K8 s platform such as AKS, EKS, and GKE.
Proficiency in Public Cloud infrastructure services including compute, storage, networking, databases, identity, and security with focus on both AWS, and Azure.
Proficiency in troubleshooting skills (in example, TCP/IP, DNS, File system, Load balancing, database, Java)
Experience in administering scalable and resilient applications in the cloud.
Bachelor degree in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent experience. Master s degree is a plus
Prior enterprise support experience in a technical environment strongly preferred
Readiness to work APAC/EMEA shifts.

Job Description:
Job description
Cloudera is looking for a software engineer with strong distributed systems expertise to join the Cloudera Data Engineering team. This team builds and maintains the Cloudera Data Engineering Experiences (CDE) within the overall Cloudera Data Platform (CDP).
Cloudera Data Engineering Experience is the next-generation cloud-native SaaS/PaaS platform to allow customers to run large-scale data engineering workflows (consists of Spark, Python, Airflow, etc.) with just a few clicks.
We are looking for Staff Engineers with experience in large-scale, distributed systems to help build our enterprise-grade Data Engineering Experiences powered upon open-source technologies such as Apache Spark, Apache Airflow, and Kubernetes.

The Data Engineering team spans across the globe working in India, China, the United States, Hungary, and Australia. Many of the team members are deeply involved in open-source projects and communities like Apache Software Foundation and CNCF.
As a Staff Software Engineer, you will:
Work with amazing people - We are a fun & smart team, including many of the top luminaries in Apache Spark, Apache Airflow, Apache Hadoop, Kubernetes, and related open-source communities.
Do innovative work - Cloudera pushes the frontier of big data & data engineering.
We re trying to provide the best easy-to-use data engineering product which also balance the performance and the cost.
We encourage members to participate in the open-source community and do more tech talks.
Be a part of a great culture - Transparent and open meritocracy. Everybody is always thinking of better ways to do things, and coming up with ideas that make a difference. We build our culture to be the best workplace in our careers.
Significant opportunities for growth - Become an expert on the latest Cloud-native/PaaS/SaaS technologies such as Kubernetes, AWS, and Azure, as well as Big data technologies such as Spark/Airflow, etc.
We re excited about you if you have:
7+ years of professional software development.
Experience leading and delivering complex product enhancements.
We use GoLang/Java/Scala/Python in projects, you should have a strong understanding of at least one of the following languages: GoLang (preferred), Java, Scala, Rust, C++, and Python. And interested in learning the languages we re using.
Experience with systems design, and development.
Passionate about programming, clean coding habits, attention to detail, and focus on quality.
Strong oral and written communication skills.
Strong ability to research and solve problems independently without constant supervision.
(Most importantly) Open-minded, desire to learn new things and build great products.
It is a plus if you have:
Experience with using/developing Apache Spark/Airflow or other related technologies.
Experience building and maintaining applications on Kubernetes.
Experience with the cloud service (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Experience with large-scale, distributed, data processing systems design and development with an understanding of high availability and performance.
Experience building scalable, robust, and secure Enterprise applications.
Committer of open-source projects.
What you can expect from us:
Generous PTO Policy
Support work life balance with Unplugged Days
Flexible WFH Policy
Mental & Physical Wellness programs
Phone/Internet Reimbursement program
Access to Continued Career Development
Comprehensive Benefits
Competitive Packages
Paid Volunteer Time
Employee Resource Groups

Job Description:
Job description
Responsibilities
A day in the life of an Infoscion
As part of the Infosys delivery team, your primary role would be to ensure effective Design, Development, Validation and Support activities, to assure that our clients are satisfied with the high levels of service in the technology domain.
You will gather the requirements and specifications to understand the client requirements in a detailed manner and translate the same into system requirements.
You will play a key role in the overall estimation of work requirements to provide the right information on project estimations to Technology Leads and Project Managers.
You would be a key contributor to building efficient programs/ systems and if you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!

Job Description:
Job description
Secure data management and portable cloud-native data analytics delivered in an open, hybrid data platform. Whether you're powering business-critical AI applications or real-time analytics at scale, Cloudera Data Platform enables your business to do anything with your data, anywhere, securely.
What is Cloudera Enterprise Enterprise Platform for Big Data. Cloudera Enterprise includes CDH, the world’s most popular open source Hadoop-based platform, as well as advanced system management and data management tools plus dedicated support and community advocacy from our world-class team of Hadoop developers and experts.
Responsibilities -
Over all 6 to 10 years of experience with Data Management, Big Data, Data Warehousing and Analytics
At least 3 to 6 years of experience in developing and Implementing Big Data Solutions
At least 5 years of hands-on experience with Cloudera implementation of Hadoop
Technologies such as Map Reduce,Spark
4 years of experience in building high performance ETL/ELT jobs using spark framework
Strong experience working with high velocity and high volume data, including good experience in handling relational, semi-structured, and unstructured data (Mandatory to have Big data experience)
Experiencing in Injecting the data into Hadoop cluster from external sources such as Oracle, SQL etc.
Strong Python with Pyspark experience is MUST
Should be able to demonstrate work experience in hive/Impala and Spark, PySpark.
Familiar with framework-based data ingestion and engineering
Experience with data process Orchestration, end-to-end design and build process of Near-
Real Time and Batch Data Pipelines
Strong client-facing communication and facilitation skills
Hadoop focused developer with focus on BI and data analysis
Strong spark hands on skill a must. Very Strong SQL skills.
Working knowledge of shell scripting and bash
Working experience in AWS platform and familiar with s3, Redshift is desirable
Good knowledge of Hadoop Cluster Architecture and hands-on experience within Cloudera
Hadoop ecosystems
Soft Skills -
Willing to work supporting USA Timezone / overlap USA timezone
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work in a team environment
Strong communication skills in English, both written and spoken
Strong in Agile-Development
Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills

Job Description:
Job description
The Project is about Cloudera to Opensource Hadoop Migration. Below will be the responsibility of this Hadoop Admin position -
Installation, configuration, Patching and maintenance of Open Source Hadoop, Cloudera Distribution for Hadoop (CDH), Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) and other Hadoop, Big Data components.
Set up new Open Source, CDH and HDFS/Hive instances.
Manage and monitor Hadoop cluster connectivity and security.
Implement and manage backup, disaster recovery, and security strategies.
Integrate Hadoop Ecosystem with other platform and applications of the Organization
Collaborate with data engineering and data science teams to optimize Hadoop clusters for performance and efficiency.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Hadoop infrastructure components.
Develop and maintain operational best practices for Cloudera and open source Hadoop administration.
Stay up-to-date with the latest Hadoop ecosystem technologies and trends.
Perform capacity planning and scalability assessments for Hadoop clusters.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of Hadoop clusters with other systems and applications.

Periodically test DR deployment
Manage data reconciliation while failover/fallback.

Job Description:
Job description
Technology Specialist - Big Data / Big Data Lead

Location: Bangalore / Chennai / Pune

About Maveric:
Maveric Systems is 21-year-old software consulting organization which focuses on partnering with global banks to solve their business challenges through technology. Through our commitment to finding the best solutions for our customers, we have been able to establish ourselves as a trusted partner by many banks and expect us to deliver on some of the challenging digital transformations they undertake. With focused approach we have ensured we delivered on the customers trust and has resulted in industry leading growth in last 3 years. Our associates find Maveric’s entrepreneurial culture to be extremely fulfilling and many have chosen to stay on very long period to build high growth careers.
To design, conduct, and organize training programs to improve employee performance and ensure organizational productivity and customer satisfaction.

Desired Candidate Profile:

Last 8-12 years need to be in big data engineering projects involving Hadoop, HBase, Kafka, Hive, Spark, Spark streaming, in-memory database systems, column-oriented database systems and document databases (NoSQL and SQL).
Excellent knowledge in SQL & Linux Shell scripting
Big Data Processing Technologies: Spark/Flink, Nifi, Kafka, RESTful, Java, Python
Big Data Storage: Object Store, HDFS, Hive, Presto, Data Warehouse, NoSQL(HBase/Cassandra), SQL
Strong communication, Interpersonal, Learning and organizing skills matched with the ability to manage stress, Time, and People effectively.
Proven experience in co-ordination of many dependencies and multiple demanding stakeholders in a complex, large-scale deployment environment
Ability to manage a diverse and challenging stakeholder community
Diverse knowledge and experience of working on Agile Deliveries and Scrum teams.

Qualifications:
An Engineering degree/ computer science Graduate.
A post graduate degree / MCA is an added advantage.

Job Description:
Job description
We are looking for a passionate, creative, collaborative, and solutions-oriented teammate to join the Learning & Enrichment team.
The Learning & Enrichment team is responsible for world-wide Clouderan learning experiences, including both managers and individual contributors, and organizational change management.
You will:
Facilitate L&OE and DE+I training opportunities within the APAC region.
Partner with the business to understand current needs related to training and development.
Act as the change management subject matter expert for Learning programs and initiatives.
Ensure that programs and trainings are aligning with the overall company strategy.
Harness technology and digital capabilities to increase program reach and value.
Embed measurement and feedback mechanisms into each program to ensure that we meet our objectives and can iterate with agility.
Assist program design and development partners with content creation.
Partner closely with the content designers on the L&OE team as well as the DE&I team.
You have:
Bachelors Degree in related field preferred or 7+ years equivalent work experience
Desired experience within learning & organizational development
Strong project management skills with experience managing multiple projects at once
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to connect with employees at all levels.
Experience and success working on high impact programs with urgency
A passionate, creative, collaborative, solutions-oriented mindset
Analytical skills with high attention to detail
Bilingual is a plus, specifically in Chinese (Mandarin), Japanese, or additional language

Job Description:
Job description
We are seeking a Python Developer with a strong foundation in object-oriented concepts and the Python language. You should possess a solid understanding of software engineering principles, including data structures, algorithms, design patterns, messaging patterns, containerization, and building enterprise-level applications and microservices.

Key Requirements:
- A minimum of 4 years of hands-on experience with Django or Flask, along with proficiency in working with MySQL or PostgreSQL databases and building RESTful APIs.
- Strong expertise in Python, including the ability to develop scalable systems and implement best coding practices, such as SonarQube and conducting code reviews.
- Sound knowledge of computer science fundamentals, enabling you to design and build robust, scalable systems.
- Proficiency in writing SQL queries and working with both relational and NoSQL databases.
- Experience with middleware technologies like Kafka, RabbitMQ, and familiarity with cloud platforms such as Azure and AWS.
- Exposure to DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and Docker containerization.
- Proficiency in documentation using tools like Swagger, providing clear and comprehensive API documentation.
- Proven track record of transferring data to cloud platforms using Python.
- A strong plus would be knowledge or experience in Artificial Intelligence.
- A minimum of 3 years of experience with Git for version control, serverless architecture, and AWS Lambda functions.

If you are a seasoned Python Developer with expertise in Django or Flask, along with a strong background in database systems, REST API development, and cloud integration, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Job Description:
Job description
8+ Years of experience in Configuring, managing and Cisco ASR Modular Routers, Nexus Switches, Firepower firewalls. Radware Alteon Load Balancer. Good understating in various routing protocols, load balancing methods. CCNP Certification is mandatory.

1. Manage and maintain Cisco ASR Modular Routers, Nexus Switches, Firepower firewalls. Radware Alteon Load Balancer.

2. Managing network security by implementing various policies and controls on firewalls and VPN.

3. Manage and maintain the perimeter security (DMZ) as per the industry best practices.

4. Ensure the external firewalls are updated with latest OS and patches.

5. Implement a logging mechanism to track the any security breaches at internal and external appliances.

6. Manage and monitor the network connectivity and implement a monitoring system to track and optimize the bandwidth.

7. Configuring and managing the load balancer's security features, such as access control lists (ACLs) and denial of service (DoS) protection

8. Monitoring and analyzing the load balancer's performance and traffic patterns, and making adjustments as necessary

9. Troubleshooting and resolving any issues that arise with the load balancer or the servers it is balancing traffic.

10. Managing the load balancer's firmware and software upgrades

11. Keeping track of the Load balancer's license and ensuring it doesn't expire.

12. Managing and maintaining network services, such as DNS and DHCP.

13. Coordinate with ISPs to adhere to the SLAs and resolve issues within set timelines

14. Define and implement network policies, procedures and standards

15. Suggest improvements to network performance, capacity and scalability

16. Configure and install periodical updates and security fixes on the Routers, switches, firewalls and other network and security appliances.

17. Managing and maintaining network backups and disaster recovery plans.

18. Managing and maintaining network-related software, such as operating systems and utilities.

19. Managing and maintaining network-related licenses and contracts.

20. Monitor network to ensure optimal performance.

21. Create and maintain network userspermissions.

22. Monitoring network performance and troubleshooting any issues that arise. Providing technical support to users and other IT staff.

23. Collaborate with other IT staff such as system administrators and database administrators to ensure overall IT infrastructure is running smoothly.

24. Document the existing network with the subnet & IP details. Also document all network settings on the firewalls, routers and servers.

A Network Administrator is responsible for managing and maintaining an organization's computer network systems. Their main tasks include:
Installing and configuring network hardware and software
Monitoring network performance and troubleshooting issues
Ensuring network security through firewalls, VPNs, and other security measures
Managing user accounts and permissions
Planning and implementing network upgrades and expansions
Providing technical support to users
Staying up-to-date with new technologies and industry developments.Strong problem-solving and communication skills are also essential for success in this role.

Job description
Project Description:Network Engineer (Switching, Routing, BGP, OSPF, TCP/IP stack, Python, MPLS on Cisco, Arista, and Aruba technologies)
Responsibilities:• Provide feedback on project status, milestones, and risks
• Develop LAN/WAN strategies; evaluate and select hardware and software products, implement and integrate these products into comprehensive solutions meeting company's business requirements
• Performs after-hours systems support, installation, and maintenance as required
• Provide specialized technical expertise in researching and resolving complex technology network infrastructure problems which may involve coordination of hardware and software vendor support
• Advise team members on procedures, techniques, and requirements to insure maximum performance and availability of the company infrastructure. Recommend areas for improvement in both processes and systems
• Conduct implementations, conversions, and upgrades in a manner consistent with Standard Operating Procedures within company maintenance windows; including change management procedures
• Communicate effectively with supervisors, peers, project managers, and stakeholders
• Author technical documentation such as network diagrams
• Work closely with vendors on implementation of products and services
• Ensure security and operational standards and procedures are maintained in accordance with UHG IT compliance requirements, HIPPA standards, and industry best practices
• Perform risk analysis to identify IT security issues and remediating plans. Identify and/or mitigate operational risks where appropriate
• Excellent interpersonal skills including written and verbal skills with the ability to create and maintain strong relationships with members of cross departmental teams and department team members
• Available to work after hours and on-call

Job description
As a spin-off from SAP (a market leader in enterprise application software), SAP Fioneer builds on a heritage of outstanding technology and a deep understanding of corporate and consumer demands
This gives us a head start to bring financial services to the next level with innovative software solutions and platforms
We are helping companies in the financial services industry to achieve speed, scalability, and cost-efficiency through digital business innovation, cloud technology, and solutions that cover banking and insurance processes end-to-end
About the Role
You advise and support SAP Fioneer in all relevant system integration processes and independently manage sub-projects.
Using both agile and traditional project methods, you assist in requirements analysis, design, implementation, and deployment of customized integration solutions.
You bring innovative solutions in the areas of Identity & Access Management and integration with S/4HANA or integration possibilities for S/4HANA Cloud solutions.
Additionally, you provide support in cross-SAP topics and serve as a PS/SD expert for clients and colleagues.
You have a minimum of 3 years of solid professional experience in IAM (Identity and Access Management) and SAP integration (optional experience with SAP SuccessFactors).
Additionally, you possess excellent knowledge of business processes and their interrelationships and dependencies.
You also have experience in the application and/or design of SAP solutions.
You have a quick grasp of concepts and enthusiastically delve into new subject areas.
Your strong communication skills, initiative, and ability to work in a team set you apart.
Excellent English language skills.

Job description
As a data modeler, you play a key role to deliver a modern data strategy to our customer. Your responsibilities include:
Analyze and clarify business needs with customers and partners and translate them into solid and long-lasting data model extensions
Collaborate with customers, partners and the FSDP teams to create an optimized, reusable semantic model and data products for the financial services industry
Develop semantic mapping between different data representations to provide system integrations
Maintain the metadata of the model - describing the data model itself, its structure, governance aspects, and additional business relevant data such as related business processes
Develop and establish standards and modeling patterns to ensure standardization and efficiency
Support the team in enhancing the long-term vision of FSDP and identify key changes in the market
Join a team that promotes an empowered culture, allowing all employees the ability to contribute and to make a difference. We value people that do what it takes to deliver superior results to our customers. We embrace innovative technology and new ideas.

Academic degree in Computer Science, Engineering or comparable qualification
3 to 6 years experience in the field of data modelling (e.g. ERM, SERM, UML, etc.)
Good understanding of business processes and FS products
A good understanding of any relational databases and SQL
Strong analytical, data profiling and problem-solving skills
Hands on experience on any data modeling tool will be an added advantage.

Job description
Responsible for defining a well aligned and consistent architecture based on S/4HANA architectural principles.

Develop complex framework features focusing on design, coding, testing, quality assurance and product standard compliance

Job Description:
Job description
Technical Leadership: Provide technical guidance and leadership to the development team
Mentor and coach team members, assist in problem-solving, and foster a collaborative and productive work environment
System Design and Architecture: Collaborate with stakeholders to understand project requirements and translate them into technical specifications and system designs
Define the overall architecture and design patterns for the project
Development and Coding: Participate in software development activities, including coding, debugging, and testing
Ensure adherence to coding standards, best practices, and quality guidelines
Technical Planning: Collaborate with project managers and stakeholders to plan technical deliverables, milestones, and timelines
Identify potential technical risks and propose mitigation strategies
Technical Reviews: Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, performance, and adherence to architectural guidelines
Provide constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement to team members
Technology Evaluation and Selection: Stay updated on emerging technologies, frameworks, and tools
Evaluate and recommend appropriate technologies and tools to meet project requirements and improve development efficiency
Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and quality assurance engineers, to ensure effective collaboration and delivery of technical solutions
Communicate technical concepts and progress to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
Technical Problem-Solving: Analyze complex technical issues, identify root causes, and propose solutions
Troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges faced by the team
Performance Optimization: Optimize system performance by analyzing and tuning code, databases, and infrastructure components
Identify bottlenecks and implement optimizations to improve system efficiency
Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest technologies, programming languages, frameworks, and industry best practices
Continuously enhance technical skills and knowledge through self-learning and professional development opportunities
Qualifications:
Education: A bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is typically required
Additional certifications or advanced degrees in relevant technical areas are beneficial
Technical Expertise: Strong proficiency in programming languages, frameworks, and tools relevant to the project
In-depth knowledge of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices
System Design and Architecture: Experience in designing scalable, robust, and maintainable software systems
Knowledge of architectural patterns (e g, MVC, Microservices) and familiarity with cloud technologies and architectures
Leadership and Team Management: Proven experience in leading and mentoring software development teams
Ability to motivate and guide team members to achieve project goals
Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts and ideas to team members and stakeholders
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to analyze complex technical issues and propose effective solutions
Project Management: Familiarity with project management methodologies and tools
Ability to plan and manage technical deliverables, prioritize tasks, and meet project deadlines
Collaboration and Teamwork: Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to deliver high-quality technical solutions

Job Description:
Job description
An HR Professional is responsible for executing various human resources (HR) functions within an organization.
Key responsibilities include:
Recruiting and staffing: sourcing, screening, and hiring new employees.
Employee relations: addressing and resolving employee concerns, complaints, and conflicts.
Performance management: conducting performance evaluations and providing feedback to employees.
Employee development: creating and implementing employee training programs and career development plans.
Compensation and benefits: administering employee compensation and benefits programs, such as salaries, bonuses, and insurance.
Compliance: ensuring compliance with federal and state employment laws and regulations.
Policy development and administration: creating, updating, and communicating HR policies and procedures.
Employee records management: maintaining accurate and up-to-date employee files and records.
Diversity and inclusion: promoting and fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace culture.
Other HR-related tasks as assigned by management.
Qualifications:
Strong knowledge of federal and state employment laws and regulations.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with employees at all levels of the organization.
Good organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks effectively.
Experience with HR information systems (HRIS) and other HR technology solutions.
Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive employee information.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and resolve HR-related issues.

Job Description:
Job description
What you will do:
Synopsys has a unique opportunity for an enthusiastic and results-oriented Technical Writer to be part of our world-class Technical Publications team. You will empower our customers to design-in and optimize our products. Your knowledge of our products, along with your passion for electronics, software, and communication technology, will be key in creating content that turns our products into easy-to-use Semiconductor IP Solutions for the largest companies in the world.
You''ll use your powerful skill set to plan, organize, write, and edit all types of customer documentation. You will be in a team environment, working side-by-side with world-class engineers and creating multiple types of essential customer documentation in numerous dynamic formats. Sound interesting?
If you want a career at a great company, be part of a dynamic team, and are eager to work with the newest Semiconductor IP Solutions, get in touch with us!
What we offer:
Competitive compensation package with performance-based bonus and stock
Excellent health benefits
Working with exceptional talent around the world
Stable career-driven working environment
High Performance, High Reward career progression
Integration in a dynamic, inclusive, diverse, and experienced team
Flexible working environment
Diverse team activities that promote team growth and idea sharing
Clear, focused, and proven enabling plan in both tools and processes

Hard skills we are looking for:
Degree or masters in any electronics, science, hardware, computing, software, physics, mathematics, or engineering discipline. Other technical disciplines also considered.
3-5 years technical writing experience in software or hardware industry
Excellent problem-solving skills; strong logical reasoning and solution-oriented
Experience with authoring tools such as FrameMaker and Oxygen
Excellent English writing and speaking skills
Soft skills we are looking for:
Has excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Energetic and capable of learning new technologies as necessary
Team player and able to work independently with minimal supervision
You care (about others, about doing a good job, about details)
You take ownership of projects and tasks assigned to you with little to no supervision and have pride in quality work done correctly the first time
Advantageous skill areas that will give you the edge:
Familiarity with semiconductor design flows
Structured FrameMaker
Oxygen editor and XML flows
XSLT and XPATH
DITA, DocBook, or IP-XACT XML schemas
FrameScript, ExtendScript, or FDK
DITA Open Toolkit

Job Description:
Job description
The SAP BASIS Administrator will be a senior technical member.
The SAP BASIS Administrator is responsible for driving successful projects around SAP S4 HANA platforms and doing support on S4 HANA systems. The role also demands expertise in SAP technologies: SAP Basis, ECC, S4, BW/BI, DB HANA, SAP ABAP, SAP NetWeaver, SLT, SAP Fiori, SAP Web Dispatcher, SSO 3.0 Solution, SAP Data Services and Cloud technologies (Azure).
The SAP Basis Administrator will organize day to day operations: Build, Refresh Systems, TMS Administration, Administration, Monitoring tasks of the S/4 HANA, Coordinate with Team, Handle Major activities end to end (Planning and Execution) SAP S/4 HANA and ECC environments.
System Refreshes, SSO configuration, installation of SSL certificates. familiar with Active Control Transport administration.
Applying Support Package, Kernel patch upgrade, TMS configuration and Transport administration (Transport strategy), maintaining of operation modes and profile parameters, background job management.


Primary skills
Hands on experience of implementation for S/4HANA solutions.
Experience and deep knowledge of SAP upgrades. Experience in SAP data Archiving. Write Operational procedures.
SAP BASIS/NetWeaver certification is a plus.
SAP Fiori knowledge is highly desirable. Skills on Linux is required. Scripting skills is a plus.
Experience in BASIS Project Management is plus.


Secondary Skills
Configuration
Monitoring

Job Description:
Job description
IT Technology Services Senior Specialist - SAP Basis, NetWeaver & Sybase Adaptive Server Enterprise
MEET YOUR TEAM
Within the Product Engineering board area, the mission of the ECS Delivery Delivery organization is to run and operate SAPs private cloud offering. Isolated private cloud landscapes are built for customers both in SAP owned datacenter as well as on IaaS infrastructure provided by hyperscalers like Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform or Amazon Web Services (AWS). ECS delivered services include backups, patching, provisioning, and upgrades, restore and disaster recovery, infrastructure monitoring and event detection. Services are delivered from all regions (EMEA/MEE/AMER/APJ) having a strong international focus and cultural diversity.
As part of ECS Delivery, the Disaster Recovery team focuses on implementing standardized processes to provide Disaster Recovery systems to our customers. This includes developing automation of cloud deployment and operations as well as co-innovating with customers and other SAP teams to setup first time builds of new SAP solutions in the ECS portfolio.
WHAT YOU''LL DO
As an experienced and hands-on SAP technology experts you''ll work in the Regional Delivery MEE team witha Customer Firstmindset. As a team, we engage customers in three segments. Proactive, Reactive, and Continuous Improvement.
Proactive: As a core team member, you are assigned to work with a dedicated top customer account in the MEE region for a limited period. With front office teams and TechOps delivery organization, you define and own a fit-4-purpose engagement model to maximize customer value and address pressing topics that otherwise impact daily operations.
Reactive: You shall be playing a catalyst role to bring the situation into business as usual (Red-to-Green) with your experience, structured thinking, teamwork, and customer empathy with involvement in the following areas:
Demand-based engagement in critical situation management e.g. Major outages, War room cases, and maintenance issues like disaster Recovery / Backup & Restore.
Service Entitlement fulfillment issues e.g. Delays, Complex request
Hypercare for specific customer case
Continuous Improvement: Identify and address customer pain points and value leaks in the MEE region to further improve ECS service. Periodic engagement in ECS strategic PoC / pathfinder projects to represent delivery.
WHAT YOU BRING
Hands-on experience in Basis, System Performance Management, Database, Lifecycle events (Upgrades / Updates)
Practical knowledge with SAP technologies like SAP NetWeaver, Business Objects, SAP HANA and SAP Sybase Adaptive Server Enterprise (ASE)
SAP system installation / configuration with Linux and Windows operating systems
Good understanding of around database and filesystem replication and preparation of network routing.
Experience in Problem Management, root cause analysis
Ready to learn other SAP product administrations like cloud connector, S4HANA etc
Use to working in a matrix set-up
Can take a lead to drive multiple stakeholders with Organize / Structure day2day documentation
English (fluent) and German added benefits
Project Management experience, knowledge of JIRA, Service Now is a plus

1. Experience in the selection, implementation, and support of SRM Portal(Supplier Relationship Management) for SAP.
2. Worked in Minimum 3-4 end to end SAP SRM Portal Implementation Project.
3. Experience in setting single sign on.
4. SRM logging page customization experience mandatory.
5. SAP Net Weaver Portal Knowledge is must. Minimum experience is 4-5 years must.
6. Experience in dealing with content administration & system administration.
7. Lead multiple sized projects as team member or lead to implement new functionalities and improve existing functionalities including articulating, analyzing requirements and translating them into effective solutions
8. Prepare T.S with reference to F.S.
9. Knowledge and experience in implementation planning, fit analysis, configuration, testing, rollout and post-implementation support.
10. Experience in working with teams to prioritize work and drive system solutions by clearly articulating business needs.

Job description
In this role you will...
Assess requirements and propose technical solutions and guidance in collaboration with Sales, Account Management and Implementation teams.
Conduct the execution of the projects in collaboration with the different teams involved.
Manage and own a mix of different projects at the same time and execute based on priorities.
Create thorough & detailed requirements documents and technical specifications for integration solutions, to provide to the customer (for approval) and engineering (for the development).
Work in a very international environment and closely with engineering teams, providing requirements in the development of integration solutions.
Manage and expand relationships high and wide in customer organizations to expand the relationship footprint.
Collaborate with other functions to ensure excellent delivery of service, quality deliverables and the highest level of customer satisfaction possible.
Youve got what it takes if you have...
Strong background in consulting, project management, strategic planning and/or business analysis.
Experience in process design, research and competitive analysis, package implementation, knowledge of multiple technologies and interactive design.
Exceptionally strong leadership, interpersonal and communication skills to effectively manage customer project stakeholders and multidisciplinary teams.
Experience in Project Management and/or full lifecycle software development process and methods.
Expertise in one or more industries, organizational structures, business process design techniques and development methodologies.
Strong technical background, with experience identifying solutions that integrate Enterprise applications, SaaS or other complex services.
Key skills and experiences would include, but not limited to, working with API/webservices, XML, SQL Server, data migrations and integrations.
Experience with software integrations and data migrations as a consultant or project lead required: Target platforms or technologies, Microsoft, PeopleSoft, SAP, HR Access, ADP, Oracle, Siebel, or Salesforce.
Thorough understanding of the project life cycle process to effectively manage through the complexities of the business solution.
Highly proficient using Excel and Word. MS Project and Visio preferred.
PMI or PMP certification, an advantage.
Previous experience working with Talent Management systems, an advantage.
Previous experience within an Agile or Scrum team, an advantage.
Fluency in English mandatory. Additional languages, an advantage.
Must be comfortable working in a fast paced and highly agile environment, working with multiple customers on multiple projects concurrently.

Job Description:
Job description
The role of the Product Support Specialist is primarily to provide support on LNRSs expanding Payment Efficiency and Compliance solutions, to both existing and new clients, which are used by financial and corporate institutions globally. In addition, the position requires the Product Specialist to support various watch list screening and reference tools as well as data files designed to help institutions improve payments processing efficiency.
This role provides clients with a technical resource when working through a range of issues within the existing Java based, installed client-side, product set. The Product Support Specialist brings a client-focused approach with a good understanding of how Product Support plays a key role regarding winning and retaining new business.
This is a role suited to an experienced Product Support professional who has a strong technical background, the ability to communicate effectively and good client skills.
About the Responsibilities:
Provide technical support for LNRS products, installed behind our clients firewalls, across the entire client portfolio.
Interact with technical team members of the client staff.
Liaise with LNRS Software Engineering and Professional Services team members while trouble shooting complex, escalated client issues.
Provide post-sales support for clients and prospects to help support the sales operation.
Use appropriate software tools to diagnose proper resolution of customer questions and problems.
Manage and develop procedures to ensure quality support for all LNRS products.
As part of the global product support team, this role is required to support LNRS clients in South Asia as well as clients worldwide.
Eligible candidates need to be comfortable with working on 24/7 shifts on rotational basis, with preset rosters considering our middle-east clients it involves working through Saturday/Sunday as well.
This role may be required to join global 24/7 on call rotation with the rest of global product support team members.


Overall Work Experience- 3+ Years
Expectations from this Role-
Supporting Applications post Go-Live
Global Customer-facing
Resolving customer queries (Technical Functional)
24/7 global rotational shift
Essential skills and knowledge
Experience of working with Java applications hosted on IBM WebSphere and Apache Tomcat
Experience with relational database management tools (MS Access, SQL Server, Oracle, etc.)
Experience working with and understanding of web services.
Experience working directly with clients in a support capacity.
Experience and understanding of incident management, preferably Salesforce.com.
Detail-oriented, excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
Experience understanding and analyzing application and web application server logs.
Strong proficiency in MS Office
Experience in Linux/UNIX
Strong client focused approach to work
Proven ability to work independently.
Ability to meet deadlines while working under pressure.
Bachelor s degree in a technical field (i.e., CS, MIS) or 3 years professional experience in a technical product support role
Desired skills and knowledge
Experience with Microsoft batch file scripting.
Basic experience with programming (Java, Python, etc.)
Process improvement / refinement experience.
Experience in banking compliance and financial services
Benefits:
Group Health Insurance Policy (covering self and family)
Group Life insurance/accident policy
Generous long-service awards
New Baby gift

Job Description:
Job description

Roles and Responsibilities
Should analyze, design, implement and maintain the network s F5 Load Balancer
infrastructure.
Should inspect data packets and TCP, IP flow in network and application flow.
Must be an expert in F5 Load Balancing platforms and will possess a working
knowledge of switches, routers, and firewall concepts.
Should be able to configure and maintain F5 Load Balancers, load balancing best
practices and WAN/LAN network management.
Should also take the responsibility to upgrade network operating systems software
and hardware as per the management requirements.
Must provide inputs into security technology plan.
Must ensure that the plans are integrated effectively with the other aspects of the
technical infrastructure.
Should provide all the necessary support for large scale infrastructure migrations and
baseline reviews. The engineer should have a good understanding to work with other
networking security groups as well. The professionals should be able to handle any
issues related to engineering design and deployment implementation.
Other Requirements:
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must
Ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations
Strong technology background is required
Aptitude to acquire new technology and concepts quickly
Core technical Skills:
Design Implement F5 Load Balancers.
Deep understanding of network protocols ( Routing / Switching )
Hands on experience in migrating other load balancer vendors to F5 Load Balancer
Design and implement Load balancing rules using industry best practices.
Develop transition strategies and implementation plans for the deployment of new
network architecture designs.
Communicate network architecture designs clearly and effectively to technical and
non-technical decision makers.
Perform security hardening of network systems
Develop or contribute to technical documentation including Low Level design
documentation, Technical Implementation document, deployment/build plans, and
test plans.
Deploy designed solution within a testing environment to verify compliance with
security and functional requirements.
Implementing F5 Traffic path switching (TPS) in addition to application based load
balancing
Provide cutover support when solution is deployed in production environment ( Go
Live ).
Data collection, analysis and change recommendations of configuration
Collection and analysis of customer network information as well as packet capture
Recommending corrective actions based on gathered data and its analysis
Ability to learn and apply new technologies, architectural, design patterns and latest
solutions.
Troubleshooting and resolving implementation issues.
Update skills regularly on the new technologies and attend workshops.
Professional Skills:
Around 5+ years of overall experience in implementation and support at provide
integrator ( Preferred )
Provides deep architecture expertise, in a specific technology area.
Assessment, design, configuration Implementation of the solutions.
Ability to understand and map customer requirements and providing the best
solutions.
Ability to demonstrate the solutions ( POC demo ) for enterprise customers.
Efficient and self-confidence to manage and implement critical projects at high profile
customers.
Strong understanding of the Industry best practices
Plans and manages the high-level architecture strategy and design work for complex,
enterprise-wide deployments.

Department: Engineering - Hardware & Networks

Job Description:
Job description
Job Summary:
As part of the Global Operations Team, the Network Team Leader will be responsible for leading a team of engineers organized by subject matter expertise. Building & maintaining a cohesive, energized team working alongside a complicated set of geographically dispersed stakeholders including management, technology architects and technology staff to assist in the lifecycle of new client services, from design and development, through to implementation and on-going support.

Essential Job Duties and Responsibilities:
Supervision of the Global Operations Network team and any strategic or HR responsibilities that may be required as part of the management of those teams.
Ensure the team adhere to best practices whilst promoting teamwork and clear communication to achieve workload prioritization
Monitor, maintain and support to ensure assigned systems are delivered on time and within budget
Responsible for undertaking performance management initiatives and assessment
Manage and maintain assigned systems or services in production and pre-production environments
Contribute to the technical strategy and procedures for the teams being managed and the wider IT function whilst ensuring team objectives are aligned with the business objectives as set by senior management
Ensure the team can adequately support the systems within the Teams control
Ensure that the departmental and company processes are followed (e.g. change control process)
Work with Solution Architects, Infrastructure Architects and Project Management to ensure that all designs are fit for purpose, supportable, and deliverable
Take the lead on assigned Network projects ensuring they are well planned and delivered on time and within budget
Contribute to the training and awareness of current and new staff
Ensure that incidents, service requests, and changes assigned to the team are received and resolved within SLAs
Attend meetings relating to the specification, implementation or operational on-boarding of new systems or services
May be required to work on other Cubic sites
Act as a point of escalation for incidents both in and outside of working hours
Comply with Cubics values and adherence to all company policy and procedures.  In particular comply with the code of conduct, quality, security and occupational health, safety and environmental policies and procedures
In addition to the duties and responsibilities listed, the job holder is required to perform other duties assigned by their manager from time-to-time, as may be reasonably required of them

Minimum Job Requirements:
A university degree in a numerate subject (e.g. Computer Science, Maths, Engineering) with 5-7 years of experience. Current Cisco Certified Network Professional qualification or a recognized equivalent. Significant experience in an IT Network technical position. Show a wider understanding across the Infrastructure support landscape, including Cloud technologies. Full lifecycle management of - will contribute to, and ensure adherence to the development, communication and implementation of a clear strategy. Substantial experience fault finding in complex system and network infrastructures. Proven track record of customer liaison and fault management with experience in a support and / or NOC environment. Experience of working in an ITIL controlled environment. Experience of working under pressure in a dynamic and fast-moving technical environment. Previous management experience. Experienced with -  
Cisco Branch and Edge Routers 
Cisco Datacentre, SAN fabric and Campus LAN Switches, including Nexus 5-7K 
Cisco Adaptive security and IDP appliances 
F5 Local and Global load-balancers 
Juniper (JUNOS) Firewalls 
Web Application or Next generation firewalls (Barracuda, Palo alto or similar) 
Ethernet, MPLS, DSL, Leased lines, ISDN 
DHCP, Dynamic DNS/BIND, SNMPv3, ACS, Radius/TACACS+, 
Fibre networks deployment and standards 
Cisco-Works LMS, Solarwinds Orion (or similar), Netflow collection and analysis. Probes, packet sniffers, cable analysers 

Personal Qualities
Excellent attention to detail and an unfaltering desire to deliver exceptional service
Customer focused and comfortable with dealing with executive level managers
Culturally fluent and able to engage people from a range of backgrounds and cultures
Able to juggle multiple tasks with deftness and attention to deadlines.
Strong analytical and influencing skills to assess demand for change and ensure that the necessary controls are in place to deliver successfully
An enthusiasm for new technologies and their application for both business and consumers
A natural curiosity and a passion for learning new skills.
A continuous improvement mindset
The tenacity to keep going when things get difficult, an optimistic and upbeat personal manner
Analytical problem solver who can quickly & accurately identify key issues
Approachable, adaptable and able to work on their own or as part of a team
Basic Security checks are required for this role.

The description provided above is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all job duties, responsibilities and requirements.  Duties, responsibilities and requirements may change over time and according to business need

Job Description:
Job description
Roles and Responsibilities
This is an Individual Contributor role where your responsibility will be to contribute to and/or lead research projects in artificial intelligence and machine learning (AI/ML).
The fields of research will include (but not limited to) large language models, conversational systems, foundation models, multimodal embeddings, image processing, optical character recognition, human-machine teaming, sentiment analysis, and/or generative AI.
You will team with other development partners and drive foundational AI research in different products like Digital Assistant and Document Capture.
You will work with all component partners to implement the vision and roadmap leveraging AI and ML in different products.

Job Description:
As an AI and ML researcher specializing in technologies like personal assistant, image processing, risk assessment, etc., your essential duties would involve a combination of research, development, and implementation tasks.
Research: Stay up to date with the latest advancements and research trends in the relevant fields. Conduct literature reviews, analyze existing algorithms, and explore cutting-edge techniques in advanced DL areas.
Algorithm Development: Design and develop novel AI and ML algorithms specifically tailored for image processing tasks, such as object detection, image recognition, image segmentation, and image generation. Create efficient algorithms for personal assistant functions, including speech recognition, natural language understanding, dialogue management, and personalized recommendations.
Data Collection and Preparation: On relevant datasets for training and testing embedding and semantic text similarity models. Clean, preprocess, and augment the data to ensure its quality and suitability for the intended tasks.
Model Training and Evaluation: Utilize machine learning frameworks and tools to train and fine-tune models finding embedding and conversational or large language models. Evaluate the performance of models using appropriate evaluation metrics and benchmarks including performance optimizations.
Performance Optimization: Optimize models and algorithms for efficiency, speed, and resource usage. Implement techniques like model compression, quantization, and parallel processing.
Integration and Deployment: Collaborate with software engineers and developers to integrate AI and ML models into larger systems or applications. Ensure seamless integration and robustness of the image processing and personal assistant functionalities. Deploy models in production environments and handle any issues that arise.
Continuous Improvement: Continuously evaluate and enhance the performance and capabilities of the deployed AI products. Keep track of user feedback and re-train & iterate on the models and algorithms to address limitations and improve user experience.
Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including researchers, engineers, designers, and product managers, to define requirements, align objectives, and deliver high-quality solutions. Effectively communicate research findings, technical concepts, and project progress.

Basic Qualifications
To be an AI and ML expert, you would require a combination of educational qualifications, technical skills, and personal attributes. Here are some qualifications that would be beneficial for such a role:

Educational Background
Bachelor's/Masters degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics or a related field.
Specialization, coursework and/or Research in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Statistics & Probability, Deep Neural Networks, Computer Vision, Signal Processing, or Natural Language Processing.Strong Foundation In AI And ML
In-depth understanding of machine learning algorithms, including supervised and unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning, deep learning, and probabilistic models.
Knowledge of statistical techniques, optimization methods, and mathematical foundations of machine learning.

Preferred Skills
Personal Assistant Systems
Familiarity with natural language processing (NLP) techniques, including text classification, named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, and language modeling.
Knowledge and understanding of Transformers and fine-tuning of LLMs is preferred.
Knowledge of Guardrails, Retrieval Augmented Generation is preferred.
Familiarity with Semantics text similarity models, retrieval models and fine-tuning of them.
Knowledge of speech recognition, text-to-speech synthesis, dialogue systems, and conversational agents.
Image Processing Expertise
Proficiency in image processing techniques, including image filtering, feature extraction, image segmentation, object detection, and image recognition.
Knowledge and understanding of CNN, Transformers and other related algorithms.
Familiarity with computer vision libraries and frameworks such as OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Scikit-learn, and Scikit-image.
Programming And Tools
Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in AI and ML, such as Python or R.
Experience in Cloud computing infrastructures like AWS Sagemaker or Azure ML for implementing ML solutions is preferred.
Experience with relevant libraries and frameworks, such as scikit-learn, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or NLTK.
Ability to work with large datasets, data preprocessing, and data wrangling.
Problem-Solving And Analytical Skills
Strong analytical and critical thinking abilities to identify and define problems, formulate hypotheses, and design experiments.
Capacity to break down complex problems into manageable tasks and propose effective solutions.
Attention to detail and ability to analyze and interpret data accurately.
Communication And Collaboration
Excellent written and verbal communication skills to articulate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Collaborative mindset and ability to work effectively in interdisciplinary teams.
Strong presentation skills to deliver research findings and project updates.
Continuous Learning
Eagerness to stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and ML through self-study, research papers, conferences, or workshops.
Willingness to adapt to new technologies, tools, and methodologies
