Job Description:
Job description
Seeking a Software Quality Assurance Tester responsible for creating, maintaining, modifying, and managing load and performance testing scripts for web applications. This individual should be able to communicate effectively with the development team to troubleshoot performance and scalability issues.

Responsibilities Plan, design, develop, execute, and maintain automated test suites using tools such as Selenium, UFT etc Design and build Performance Test Scripts and scenarios for online web applications based on Requirements Create and execute load and performance tests using the testing tools Define and develop performance test plans and automated scripts using standard testing tools Execute performance test, analyse and evaluate test results, generate performance metric reports and provide recommendations Work with functional Tester and Developers to ensure adequate coverage for upcoming releases and keep up-to date with system changes that impact performance testing Generate performance graphs, session reports and other related documentation required for validation and analysis Strong understanding of Server, Network, Virtualization and Database concepts Strong understanding of performance testing concepts, load testing concepts, types of system performance tests and their goals Excellent communication skills. Must be attentive to detail, highly-organized, and able to multi-task Expertise in performance testing of web services using LoadRunner and/or other load and performance testing tools such as WebLoad, LoadUI, LoadView etc. Demonstrate strong and clear communication skills with the ability to collaborate with project manager, analysts, developers, Quality assurance team members and representatives from business in a collaborative environment Skills Bachelor s degree in computer science or related technical discipline 5+ years of Software Testing experience with strong background in QA and Testing in a multi-server environment. Including back-end and front-end testing activities Relevant experience in developing and maintaining test automation suites using tools such as Selenium, UFT and/or other automation testing frameworks/tools such as Node.Js, Mocha, Chai, Karma, XUnit Hands on experience in Angular application automation using tools like Protractor Experience working with Continuous Integration tools like TeamCity, Octopus, Jenkins and strong understanding of builds, configuration, environment setup Experience with defect tracking tools (e.g., Jira, Mantis, Bugzilla) Experience with Visual Studio test management tools and/or Microsoft Test Manager a plus Strong understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), quality assurance life cycle and testing methodologies Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a highly demanding environment

Job Description:
Job description
Flexiti is looking for a Performance Test Engineer to join its IT team. In this role you will be working to ensure our applications meet the minimum load and stress requirements to support a robust and stable customer experience. You are an expert problem solver joining a team of passionate like-minded successful QA team.
What you will be doing:
Work with Product Owners, Enterprise support and application/developer teams to review performance test requirements and translate them into performance test strategies
Responsible for building Performance Test Plans, defining and implementing standard methods and techniques of load stress testing for assigned systems
Record performance tests with scalable number of Virtual Users (per requirements) to generate realistic load on the server using Jmeter or similar Load/Stress test tool, collect test metrics, and prepare final Test reports Results for review and signoffs
Identify, validate, and report application usage metrics (like response times, errors, etc.,) and identify unacceptable responses and provide recommendations to solve the same.
Build a suite of baseline and benchmark metrics for regular Release testing.
Work within project timelines, effectively communication with QA Engineering teams, and remain organized and detail oriented
What you should have:
At least 3+ years hands on experience in planning and executing Load and Performance Stress test on across various Front end, middleware [like APIs] and backend applications.
Comprehensive knowledge of system monitoring, system programming, and application servers.
Must have working knowledge to execute load and stress in Redline13 or a similar Load/Stress testing tool
Must have experience to write Jmeter scripts to do performance testing of APIs, Front-end and Back-end applications
Ability to understand business requirements (SLA , response times) and build a performance test strategy to achieve successful test results.
In-depth knowledge of Open-Source Technologies, code analysis, and load testing tools
Must know how to build the Performance test reports for review and signoff.
Must have credible experience in Performance Testing on APIs/microservices
Knowledge of Loadrunner/TruClient, Rediline13 or Blazemeter is a plus
Good English communication skills

Job Description:
Job description
Job Title: Data Engineer with GCP Experience
Location: India (Hyderabad, Bangalore, Chennai, Pune, and Gurgaon)
Duration: Full-time

Experience Level: 3-7 years

Job Description:
As a Data Engineer with GCP experience, you will play a crucial role in building and maintaining data pipelines, optimizing data storage, and ensuring the smooth migration of data modules to Google BigQuery. Your expertise in Dataproc, SQL, PySpark, and Google Cloud Platform will be essential in enabling our clients to harness the full potential of their data.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, maintain, and optimize data pipelines using GCP services, including Google Cloud Dataproc.
Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and ensure data availability.
Design, develop, and implement ETL processes to transform and load data into Google BigQuery, leveraging Google Cloud Dataproc for data processing and transformation.
Perform data modeling and database design to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval in Big Query.
Plan and execute the migration of existing data modules to Google Big Query, ensuring a seamless transition.
Monitor data pipelines and ensure data quality and reliability, including Dataproc cluster management.
Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues promptly, utilizing Dataproc and Big Query capabilities.
Collaborate with the Cloud Operations team to ensure data security and compliance with best practices.
Stay up to date with the latest GCP technologies, including Dataproc and Big Query, and trends to recommend improvements and innovations.

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in computer science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
3-7 years of experience as a Data Engineer with a strong focus on Google Cloud Platform.
Proficiency in SQL, PySpark and Dataproc.
Hands-on experience with Google Big Query and other GCP services.
Knowledge of data modeling and database design principles.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
GCP certifications (e.g., Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer) are a plus.

Benefits:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work on cutting-edge data projects with leading clients.
Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
Collaborative and innovative work environment.

Job Description:
Job description

We are looking for an experienced Google BigQuery Data Engineer who is responsible for
designing, developing, and maintaining BigQuery data pipelines and data warehouses.

Role & responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain BigQuery data pipelines and data warehouses.

Orchestrate the data pipelines using Airflow or GCP Cloud Composer.

Load data into BigQuery from a variety of sources, including cloud storage,
on-premises databases, and streaming data sources using Data Fusion, Data Proc,
Data Flow, etc.

Transform data using BigQuery's built-in features - Data Transfer Services and
third-party tools.

Query data using BigQuery's SQL engine and visualization tools. Understand the
internals of BigQuery such as partitioning, clustering strategies, pricing, slots, etc.

Work with stakeholders to understand their data needs and to develop data solutions
that meet those needs.

Stay up-to-date on the latest BigQuery features and best practices.


Technical Skills

Should have worked with large volumes of data and processing data at massive scale.

Overall 4+ years of hands-on data engineering experience.

3+ years of relevant experience in BigQuery or a similar cloud data warehouse.

Experience with on-prem to GCP migration is a plus.

Experience with data loading, transformation, and querying.

Experience with cloud computing platforms, such as Google Cloud Platform

You should have

Excellent written, verbal communication and client-facing skills

Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills

Bachelor's degree in computer science, data science, or a related field

The ability to quickly grasp new concepts and learn new technologies

The traits of a self-motivated, independent, detail-oriented, responsible team player

Job Description:
Job description
The Opportunity:
An OpenText Content Server Consultant is responsible for the technical delivery of the xECM based solutions. Such delivery activities encompass the design, development, deployment, testing and documentation of specific software components either providing extensions to specific items of core product functionality or implementing specific system integration components. This role has a heavy deployment and administration emphasis, combined with the consultative skills required to demonstrate quality and excellence actively fostered within the Managed Services team. An OpenText Content Server Consultant is responsible for the technical delivery of the xECM based solutions. Such delivery activities encompass the design, development, deployment, testing and documentation of specific software components either providing extensions to specific items of core product functionality or implementing specific system integration components. This role has a heavy deployment and administration emphasis, combined with the consultative skills required to demonstrate quality and excellence actively fostered within the Managed Services team.
You are great at:
Work within an OpenText technical delivery team in order to:
Participate and contribute to technical design & deployment activities.
Participate in the day to day administration of the systems, including Incident & Problem Management
Participate in planning and execution of new implementations, upgrades and patching activities.
Participate in the advanced configuration of ECM software components, in line with project and customer time scales.
To co-ordinate project delivery through multiple teams that may include 3rd party suppliers, partners and client resources.
Actively contribute in automating provisioning, patching and upgrade activities where possible to achieve operational efficiencies.
Actively seek new opportunities by working with the customer and the change control provisions provided by the contract, to extend the scope of profitable business.
Prepare, maintain and submit activity/progress reports and time recording/management reports in accordance with published procedures. Keep project managers informed of activities and alert of any issues promptly. Provide inputs as part of engagement closure on project learnings and suggest improvements
Utilize exceptional written and verbal communication skills while supporting customers via web, telephone, or email, while demonstrating a high level of customer focus and empathy.
Respond to and solve customer technical requests, show an understanding of the customer's managed hosted environment and applications within the Open Text enabling resolution of complex technical issues. Document or Implement proposed solutions.
Respond to and troubleshoot alerts from monitoring of applications, servers and devices sufficient to meet service level agreements
Collaborating on cross-team and cross-product technical issues with a variety of resources including Product support, IT, and Professional Services.
What it takes:
Well versed with deployment, administration and troubleshooting of the OpenText xECM platform and surrounding components (Content Server, Archive Center, Brava, OTDS, Search & Indexing) and integrations with SAP, SuccessFactors, Salesforce.
Good experience/knowledge on following:
Experience delivering service using ITIL methodology
Knowledge of Windows, UNIX, and Application administration skills in a TCP/IP networked environment.
Experience working with relational DBMS (PostgreSQL/Postgres, Oracle, MS SQL Server, mySQL)
Programming/scripting is helpful, (ie. Oscript, Java, JavaScript)
Familiarity with configuration and management of web/application servers (IIS, Apache, Tomcat, JBoss, etc.).
Good understanding of object-oriented programming, Web Services, LDAP configuration, and RDBMS concepts.
Experience in installing and configuring xECM in HA and knowledge in DR setup/drill.
Experince in patching, major upgrades and data migration activities.
Candidate should possess:
Strong desire to provide exceptional customer support efficiently with a high focus on first call resolution
Strong attention to detail and the ability to grasp concepts quickly and have a thirst for knowledge.
Ability to use own initiative to resolve problems and to obtain relevant information needed to perform a given task
Team player, result driven, ambitious, responsible
Enjoys sharing knowledge and communicating
OpenText's efforts to build an inclusive work environment go beyond simply complying with applicable laws. Are you looking for a career that will allow you to use your unique blend of business acumen and tech savvy? Business Analysts at IBM are subject matter experts that build the bridge between our business and our clients, immersing themselves into the market to understand problems and find innovative solutions. Be ready to navigate the complex relationships that make the business world run and find the actionable insights that result in great business decisions.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Gather business requirement and understand and map the full life cycle of business processes to ensure compliance with internal and external policies.

Job Description:
Job description
CUDA is a must

JD For Senior / Lead / Engineer (HPC GPU):-
As a Senior / Lead / Engineer (HPC) you will provide leadership in designing and implementing groundbreaking GPU computers that run demanding deep learning, high-performance computing, and computationally intensive workloads.
We seek an expert to identify architectural changes and/or completely new approaches for accelerating our deep learning models.
As an expert, you will help us with the strategic challenges we encounter, including compute, networking, and storage design for large scale, high-performance workloads, effective resource utilization in a heterogeneous computing environment, evolving our private/public cloud strategy, capacity modelling, and growth planning across our products and services.
As an architect you are responsible for converting business needs associated with AI-ML algorithms in to a set of product goals covering workload scenarios, end user expectations, compute infrastructure and time of execution; this should lead to a plan for making the algorithms production ready
Benchmark and optimise the Computer Vision Algorithms and the Hardware Accelerators for performance and quality KPIs.
Optimize algorithms for optimal performance on the GPU tensor cores.
Collaborate with various teams to drive an end to end workflow from data curation and training to performance optimization and deployment.


Skills Required
MS or PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field. A strong background in deployment of complex deep learning architectures .
2+ years of relevant experience in at least a few of the following relevant areas is required in your work history: Machine learning (with focus on Deep Neural Networks), including understanding of DL fundamentals; Experience adapting and training DNNs for various tasks; Experience developing code for one or more of the DNN training frameworks (such as Caffe, TensorFlow or Torch): Numerical analysis, Performance analysis, Model compression and Optimization & Computer architecture.
Strong Data structures and Algorithms know-how with Excellent C/C++ programming skills.
Hands-on expertise with PyTorch, TensorRT, CuDNN
Hand-on expertise with GPU computing (CUDA, OpenCL, OpenACC) and HPC (MPI, OpenMP)
In-depth understanding of container technologies like Docker, Singularity, Shifter, Charliecloud.
Proficient in Python programming and bash scripting.
Proficient in Windows, Ubuntu and Centos operating systems.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Self-motivated and able to find creative practical solutions to problems.


Good to have
Hands-on experience with HPC cluster job schedulers such as Kubernetes, SLURM, LSF.
Familiarity with cloud computing architectures
Hands-on experience with Software Defined Networking and HPC cluster networking.
Working knowledge of cluster configuration management tools such as Ansible, Puppet, Salt.
Understanding of fast, distributed storage systems and Linux file systems for HPC workloads.

We are looking for a senior mobile app developer to lead the design, development and maintenance of Android and iPhone apps. The developer will lead the entire app lifecycle right from concept stage until delivery and post launch support. Apps will be mainly content based and integrated closely with the web sites. In addition to delivering the product the successful candidate will be heavily involved in driving the mobile strategy globally.

Product Development Managers Internal Customer, working with the Brand Product Development teams to develop ideas concepts and solutions that help the brand meet their objectives.

Job Title: Salesforce Developer
Location: Kozhikode/Calicut, Kerala
Work Mode: In Office
Experience Required: 10+ years
Notice Period: Immediately Available or Max 15 Days

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Salesforce Developer to join our dynamic team in Calicut. This role requires a deep understanding of Salesforce development and a proven track record in leading and delivering complex Salesforce solutions.


Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop and maintain Salesforce applications using Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, and Salesforce APIs.
Leverage Salesforce tools like Process Builder, Workflow Rules, and Validation Rules to automate business processes.
Integrate Salesforce with external systems using REST/SOAP APIs and middleware tools.
Develop and optimize Lightning components using the Lightning Design System.
Implement robust data models, including custom objects, fields, and relationships.
Work closely with US-based clients, understanding their requirements and ensuring high-quality deliverables.
Lead and mentor a team of developers, ensuring best practices and efficient teamwork.
Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to stakeholders.

Key Skills Required:
Proficiency in Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, and Salesforce APIs.
Experience in integrating Salesforce with external systems using REST/SOAP APIs and middleware tools.
Strong knowledge of LWC and Lightning Design System.
Expertise in data modeling: designing and implementing custom objects, fields, and relationships.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with US clients and lead a team.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.


Compensation:
Competitive salary package, equal to experience and skills.
Health Insurance
Relocation Benefits
Company provided family accommodation.


Interested candidates who meet the above criteria are encouraged to submit their applications, including a resume and a cover letter, detailing how their experience aligns with the job requirements

We are seeking a highly motivated Database Engineer to design, develop, and maintain our database systems.
The candidate should have a minimum of 3+ years of experience in SQL Server with
excellent problem-solving, analytical and troubleshooting skills.

Designing and implementing database systems that are efficient, scalable, and secure. Monitoring and optimizing database performance using performance tuning concepts like Index, Query, and Stored Procedures tuning.

Job Description:
Job description
COMPANY OVERVIEW

Amla Commerce is a global software company that has grown out of the belief that
ecommerce software should enable sustainable growth. Amla has two products,
Artifi Labs and Znode. Artifi Labs is an ecommerce product customization platform
that allows shoppers to personalize, customize, and configure products. Znode is a
B2B multi-channel ecommerce platform developed with an API-first architecture,
combined with native B2B functionality and flexible data model, allowing for easy
management of manufacturers' and distributors' B2B, B2C, and B2B2X business
models.
At Amla, we are building something special, awesome ecommerce software and a
great place to be yourself. We put passion into our work but enjoy cracking jokes
along the way. Our teams tackle complex challenges and work together to create
innovative solutions, and we celebrate every little victory along the way. If youre
ready to tackle opportunities that will help grow your career, Amla is waiting for you.
Also known as MRR Soft, we are in the process of rebranding to Amla Commerce to
be inclusive of our global presence in India and the United States of America.

POSITION SUMMARY:

Amla Commerce is looking for a Database SQL Developer to join their Software
Development” team.
If you’re “Database SQL Developer” having the following skillset “Microsoft SQL
Server, T-SQL, Stored Procedure, Performance & Tuning Azure - Cloud Technology,
XML & JSON

Why this position is important?
Amla Commerce is recruiting a “Database SQL Developer”.
This is a “full-time position.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Develop high-quality database solutions.
Use T-SQL to develop and implement procedures and functions.
Review and interpret ongoing business report requirements.
Research required data.
Build appropriate and useful reporting deliverables.
Analyze existing SQL queries for performance improvements.
Suggest new queries.
Develop procedures and scripts for data migration.
Provide timely scheduled management reporting.
Investigate exceptions with regard to asset movements.

MUST-HAVES FOR THIS GIG
3+ years experience in SQL development.
T-SQL, Stored Procedure, Functions, Triggers, XML Operations, JSON support on SQL
2016 and above SSIS, SSRS, CTE, EAV Data structure, Integration with
NoSQL(MongoDB), SQL Server Indexes, Bulk Insert, BCP, CMD Shell ,Memory
Optimization, Performance Tunning, Query Optimization, Database Designing, Table
Joins, SQL Server Job agent
Backup and Maintenance plan ,Data Migration & Good Communication.

NICE-TO-HAVES FOR THIS GIG:
Working knowledge of mobile development activity.
Working knowledge of web hosting solution on IIS7.
Experience working with an offshore –onsite development process.

TO APPLY
Please send your cover letter and resume to latasha.guriya@amla.io

Job Description:
Job description
We are looking for a capable principal engineer to own the engineering of our Enrich Intelligence platform. You will be focused on maintaining and extending functionality for Enrich with high attention-to-detail ensuring trust, robustness, performance, and ease of use. Here are all the details you ll need, to see if we can work together:

You like ownership, and sense of accomplishment
You see constraints as an opportunity to creatively solve problems, and are not afraid to go against the conventional wisdom
You will work closely with the product team and the leadership to evolve the platform to meet the rapidly emerging needs of customers
You will work closely with solution architect and head of engineering roles to deploy the product and evolve it as required to meet the customer needs and roadmap
You will architect the system to continuously balance the conflicting demands of speed of delivery, stability, generality, and efficiency.
You will develop and deploy robust data processing infrastructure that can support various downstream applications including reporting, analytics, user intelligence, machine learning, and decision support.
You have strong system-level thinking and problem-solving ability paired with the love to build and ship robust code.
You have strong software engineering skills and can set up and operate well-thought-through development systems and processes.

About Enrich

Enrich is a full-stack solution in Python that enables customers to build internal-facing data products with MLRS (ML at Reasonable Scale) robustly and quickly. It trades scale of data for speed of development and deployment, strong auditability, and lower skill. It is a fully Python stack with single server packaged deployment with support for containerization if required. Simplicity and minimality are major considerations in everything that we do.

Your Strengths
8+ years of industry experience building data infrastructure including packaging, deploying, and monitoring data systems
Experience owning and developing a product in early stages is a big plus
Fluency in Python, SQL - Java knowledge will be a plus
Experience with front-end and/or being full-stack is a plus
Proficiency in designing, implementing and automating systems for data workflow management
Proficiency in developing and publishing APIs using web services
Proficiency in designing robust, scalable data architectures
Familiarity using distributed storage (e.g. S3), serverless architecture (e.g. Lambda), streaming data (e.g. Kafka), and scalable search (e.g. Elasticsearch)
Experience with containerization (e.g. Docker/Kubernetes) and other deployment tooling
Familiarity with big data technologies like map-reduce, NoSQL, Spark, HBase, and Hive
Experience with data security protocols, data access controls, AWS/GCP/Azure security mechanisms at the data and access levels, database security, scripting attacks, and API security
Having built and shipped a product at a startup will be a plus
Bachelors/Masters degree in Computer Science
Does this sound like you
You like adventure and have a stomach for learning and unlearning every day
You are excited by powering up a whole generation of upcoming data applications
You dream big and believe that hard problems need streamlined systems and massive amounts of data to tackle effectively
You embrace uncertainty and can develop processes and systems to handle rapidly evolving requirements
You have the discipline to take audacious goals and break down years-long roadmaps into near term deliverables that provide value to business stakeholders
You enjoy educating your customers and team members about what it means to be data-oriented and cultivating engineering best practices
You are comfortable selling to customers (not a biggie)
You have a sense of humour

Job Description:
Job description
* Working on large scale machine learning challenges that impact millions of people around the globe
* Researching and implementing cutting-edge algorithms and implementing pipelines that work with massive data sets in real-time
* Working on a large variety of different tasks, ranging from prediction models, cluster algorithms, optimization problems, to outlier detection
* Implementing fast, scalable solutions with optimal performance day in and out
* This position will play a crucial role in the full product development lifecycle. Machine-learning is the core of our business, and the role will be responsible for all phases of the product development lifecycle
* Evaluate and validate the analyses with statistical methods. Also presenting this in a lucid form to people not familiar with the domain of data science / computer science.
* Writing specifications for algorithms, reports on data analysis, and documentation of algorithms.

Skills and attributes for success
* 5+ years hands on experience with Python, TensorFlow, Spark, Airflow, and SQL is important
* Strong programming background in 1 or more of Python, C/C++, R, Java, and knowledge of software engineering concepts (OOP, design patterns).
* Extensive experience with the development of data-science products from research to production
* Excellent coding skills with the attitude of clean code, reproducibility, and testing
* Experience with algorithms to handle sparse and large datasets across 1 or more modalities (audio, sensors, images, videos, text) would be a great asset
* A decent understanding of dashboards and SQL will help to develop and improve monitoring tools
* Excellent mathematical and skills and background in Drifts, significance tests, metrics evaluation, visualization, advanced probability concepts

It'd be nice if you have
* Experience in Design Thinking or human-centered methods to identify and creatively solve customer needs, through a holistic understanding of customer s problem area
* Knowledge with Reinforcement learning and Optimisation problems on a large scale is a big plus
* Some experience in project management and mentoring is also a plus.
* Knowledge and experience of deploying large-scale systems using distributed and cloud-based systems (Hadoop, Amazon EC2) is a big plus.
* Passion for developing data products from scratch and a high level of proactiveness

You will excel in this role if
* You are scrappy, take ownership, and follow through to the very end
* You enjoy wearing multiple hats
* A sincere desire to learn and grow - were quite small, so the desire to learn and grow as the company grows is essential

Job Description:
Description
As a Deep Learning Engineer Intern, you will work closely with our development team to design, implement, and optimize deep learning models for various applications. You will have the chance to work on challenging projects, leveraging your expertise in deep learning, machine learning, and computer vision to make significant contributions to our AI initiatives. This internship is an excellent opportunity to further develop your skills, learn from experienced professionals, and make a meaningful impact in the field of AI.
Key Responsibilities :
Collaborate with senior deep learning engineers to develop and implement deep neural networks and machine learning algorithms.
Preprocess and analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and features.
Fine-tune existing deep learning models and optimize them for performance.
Experiment with different architectures and techniques to improve model accuracy and efficiency.
Work on computer vision tasks, such as image classification, object detection, and segmentation.
Document your work, including code, experiments, and research findings.
Present your findings and contributions to the team in a clear and concise manner.
Qualifications :
Completed a Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science.
Strong understanding of deep learning concepts, including neural networks, convolutional neural networks (CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), and transfer learning.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data visualization.
Solid mathematical foundation in linear algebra and calculus.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically.
Strong communication and teamwork skills.
Prior experience with AI-related projects or internships is a plus.
What Youll Gain :
Hands-on experience in the field of deep learning and artificial intelligence.
Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and tools.
Mentorship from experienced deep learning engineers and researchers.
The opportunity to work on real-world projects with practical applications.
A dynamic and collaborative work environment.
The chance to contribute to the advancement of AI technology.
Notes:
If you dont see the email invitation in your inbox, please check your email spam folder.
The link and login information in the email invitation are valid for only 2 days from the time you receive it.
Make sure your internet connection is stable before beginning the assessment.
Test your systems video and audio settings before initiating the assessment.
Once you commence your virtual assessment, please refrain from opening any new browser windows and avoid using the Esc button on your keyboard, as doing so will automatically cancel the assessment.

Model Development: Develop, design, and implement deep learning models and algorithms to solve specific problems or tasks, such as image recognition, natural language processing, or autonomous systems
Data Processing: Prepare and preprocess large datasets to train deep learning models, including data cleaning, augmentation, and feature engineering
Model Training: Train and fine-tune deep learning models using frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras, optimizing hyperparameters and architecture
Deployment: Integrate trained deep learning models into production systems or applications, ensuring they can make real-time predictions

Evaluation and Validation: Assess model performance and validate results, conducting tests and experiments to ensure models meet defined criteria and accuracy thresholds
Research and Development: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in deep learning, exploring and experimenting with new techniques, architectures, and research papers

Job Description:
Job description
We are seeking a talented and passionate Deep Learning Engineer to join our team. As a Deep Learning Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing cutting-edge deep learning models and algorithms for various applications. You will work closely with our research and development team to create innovative solutions using state-of-the-art deep learning frameworks.
Responsibilities :
- Develop and implement deep learning models and algorithms for image analysis and text processing tasks.
- Utilize frameworks such as Keras, PyTorch, and TensorFlow to build, train, and deploy deep learning models.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
- Conduct literature reviews and stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in deep learning techniques and methodologies.
- Clean, preprocess, and augment datasets to ensure high-quality training data.
- Train, fine-tune, and evaluate deep learning models using large-scale datasets.
- Optimize and improve the performance of deep learning models through techniques such as hyperparameter tuning and model compression.
- Deploy deep learning models into production environments and ensure scalability and efficiency.
- Collaborate with software engineers to integrate deep learning models into existing systems and platforms.
- Document research findings, methodologies, and experiment results in technical reports and presentations.
- Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in deep learning and related fields.
Requirements :

Job Description:
Job description
Job Title: Procure-to-Pay (P2P) Associate
Location: Kandanchavadi, Chennai
Duration: 12+ Months Contract

Job Summary:
As a Procure-to-Pay (P2P) Associate, you will play a crucial role in supporting the end-to-end procurement process within the organization. This entry-level position is ideal for freshers who are detail-oriented, possess strong analytical skills, and are eager to learn and grow in the field of procurement.

Responsibilities:
Purchase Requisition Processing:
Review and validate purchase requisitions from various departments.
Ensure accuracy and completeness of information before processing.
Vendor Communication:
Communicate with vendors to obtain quotes, negotiate terms, and resolve procurement-related queries.
Maintain positive vendor relationships to facilitate smooth transactions.
Purchase Order (PO) Creation:
Generate purchase orders based on approved requisitions.
Verify pricing, terms, and other details to ensure alignment with organizational policies.
Order Tracking and Status Updates:
Monitor the status of open purchase orders and provide regular updates to relevant stakeholders.
Coordinate with vendors to track order fulfillment and delivery timelines.
Invoice Verification:
Match invoices with purchase orders and receipts to ensure accuracy.
Resolve discrepancies and collaborate with internal teams and vendors for prompt issue resolution.
Payment Processing:
Collaborate with finance teams to ensure timely and accurate payment processing.
Verify payment terms and coordinate with vendors to resolve any payment-related issues.
Documentation and Record Keeping:
Maintain comprehensive records of procurement transactions.
Ensure adherence to document retention policies and assist in audits when required.
Compliance and Policy Adherence:
Ensure compliance with company procurement policies and guidelines.
Stay informed about relevant regulations and industry best practices.
Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or related field.
Skills:
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Attention to detail and accuracy.
Basic understanding of procurement processes.
Proficiency in MS Office applications.
Preferred Qualifications:
Internship or coursework related to procurement or supply chain management.
Familiarity with procurement software or ERP systems.
Thanks & Regards,

Job Description:
Job description
As a PreSales Engineer with expertise in Cyber security product sales, you will play a pivotal role in designing and promoting Cyber security solutions to both existing and potential customers
This is a techno-commercial role that requires a deep understanding of network infrastructures and a strong ability to work closely with sales teams and end customers in a technical environment
Your primary focus will be on Cyber security product sales and ensuring their successful adoption
Duties and Responsibilities
1. **Solution Design Leadership:** Act as the senior connectivity design lead for all sales opportunities, particularly for Cyber security products.
2. **Technical Advisory:** Provide trusted technical advice and recommendations to customers, colleagues, and stakeholders, leveraging your expertise in Cyber security products.
3. **Stakeholder Engagement:** Influence, persuade, and negotiate with senior stakeholders within customer and partner organizations, emphasizing the value of Cyber security solutions.
4. **End Customer Engagement:** Engage directly with end customers and channel partners to support pre-sales activities related to Cyber security products.
5. **Partner Collaboration:** Develop and maintain strong working relationships with partner organizations to ensure effective collaboration in promoting and implementing Cyber security solutions.
6. **Technical Expertise:** Be the lead technical advisor to project teams, colleagues, and customers, offering specialized technical knowledge in Cyber security products.
7. **Network Alignment:** Monitor sales activities in conjunction with network development and operational standards to ensure that customer solutions align with the principles and constraints of Cyber security products.
8. **Documentation and Collaboration:** Collaborate with colleagues across the company to ensure solution design activities related to Cyber security products are well-documented and tracked as needed.
9. **Technology Advancement:** Contribute to the development and deployment of new technologies, leveraging your expertise in Cyber security solutions to meet emerging customer requirements.
10. **Continuous Learning:** Stay updated on the latest developments in Cyber security products and related technologies by attending relevant meetings, workshops, and events.
11. **Quality Processes:** Support the development of the company s quality processes and procedures, particularly as they relate to Cyber security solutions.
12. **Industry Representation:** Represent the group at relevant meetings, conferences, and working parties as required, emphasizing Cyber security product sales.
13. **Marketing Collaboration:** Collaborate with vertical marketing for end-user-focused tools, contributing to the development of whitepapers, brochures, web presence, speaker engagements, end-user events, dedicated list procurement, and lead nurturing, all with a focus on Cyber security products.
Qualifications
- Prior experience in selling Cyber security products or similar cybersecurity solutions.
- Familiarity with Cyber security solutions and Software-as-a-Service models, along with a strong enterprise software background.
- Minimum 10-12 years of experience in driving new business with end users and partners.
- Educational background in BTECH/MTech computer engineering, coupled with an MBA/CCNA/CCNP certification.
- Strong network of end customers in the territory.
- Formal experience in vertical knowledge and deep expertise in network solutioning and design.
- An analytical, data-driven approach to decision-making.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to lead presentations.
- Capability to establish credibility with the sales force and customers.
- Strong leadership skills with cultural sensitivity and experience in influencing diverse teams.
- Critical thinking and creative problem-solving abilities, contributing effectively in a team environment

Hello All,
Greetings for the day.
Let me introduce myself my name is Kumar from Covanex India Pvt Ltd. One of our top MNC client is looking for SAP HANA/BI Developer and is a Remote location.
If anyone is available, please reply to this email with an updated profile and below is the job description for your reference.

Role: SAP HANA/BI Developer
Location: 100% Remote (Permanent Position)

We are seeking multiple SAP HANA/BI Developers with end-to-end HANA BI development including hands-on experience with HANA modelling as well as reporting using tools such as BOBJ. The ideal candidate for this role would be someone who can handle small to medium sized HANA/BI development projects independently.

ALL CANDIDATES MUST WORK FULL-TIME, 40 HOURS/WEEK MONDAY-FRIDAY IN U.S. EASTERN TIME ZONE (6:30pm IST - 3:30am IST) WITHOUT EXCEPTION.
THE INCUMBENTS CAN WORK REMOTELY FROM THEIR HOME OFFICE.

Basic Qualifications
Minimum 5+ years of experience in SAP Hana modelling and scripting, including advanced data modelling techniques.
Expertise in Native Hana Modelling , WebIDE (XSA) Modelling - HDI containers and a deep understanding of database concepts.
Strong experience in SQL Script and ability to write complex stored procedures and table functions.
Creation and maintenance of SAP BOBJ reports, primarily Web Intelligence reports.
Experienced in SAP Hana performance analysis and optimization, troubleshooting and performing root cause analysis.
Knowledge of Data Services to create, schedule and maintain BODS jobs.
Understanding of SAP Analytics Cloud.
Developing technical specifications and design documents for SAP HANA solutions.
Good to have
Scripting knowledge in SAC Application Designer and understanding of SAC Planning.
Knowledge of setting up CRON jobs in Hana.
Cross functional experience is preferred - SAP Financials/SAP Logistics.
Understanding of CDS Views, BTP and Business Application Studio.
Hands on with data provisioning tools like SDA and SDI.

Job Description:
Job description

Position: SAP ABAP Developer
Experience: 4 - 6 years 
Role: Permanent
Location: Chennai
Qualification: Graduation
Mode of work: Work from Office
Notice Period: Immediate - 15days

JD:
As a SAP ABAP Programmer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining SAP ABAP applications with a focus on SAP Fiori development. Your expertise will contribute to the successful implementation and enhancement of SAP Fiori applications.
The ideal candidate should possess a solid background in ABAP programming (preferably OOABAP) with 4-6 years of experience, along with strong knowledge and hands-on experience in ODATA developments.
Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain SAP ABAP programs, reports, interfaces, conversions,enhancements, and forms (RICEF objects) in accordance with functional specifications and technical guidelines.
Collaborate with functional consultants and UX/UI designers to gather requirements, analanalyzeyse business processes, and translate them into SAP Fiori applications (ODATA developments).
Participate in all phases of the software development life cycle (SDLC) for SAP Fiori, including design, coding, testing, debugging, documentation, and deployment.
Perform performance tuning and optimization of SAP Fiori applications to improve system performance.
Provide technical support and troubleshooting for SAP ABAP and SAP Fiori-related issues and coordinate with cross-functional teams to resolve them.
Develop and maintain technical documentation, including program specifications, test plans, and user manuals for SAP Fiori applications.
Stay updated with the latest SAP ABAP and SAP Fiori technologies, tools, and best practices, and suggest improvements to enhance system efficiency and effectiveness.
Actively participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality and maintainability.
Academic and Skill Requirements: 
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
4-6 years of hands-on experience in SAP ABAP programming (OOABAP preferred).
Strong knowledge of ABAP programming concepts, including ABAP Dictionary, ABAP Objects, and BAPI/RFC integration.
Familiarity with SAP development tools and technologies, including SAP NetWeaver and SAP ECC.
Hands-on experience developing ODATA projects for FIORI applications.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment, with excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong communication skills, with the ability to effectively interact with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Interested jobseekers can share their Cv with us at: info@altvu.in
Best Regards,
Team Altvu.

Job description
Role Overview:
As a Data Engineer with our team, you will be an integral part of designing and building scalable data solutions in a cloud environment. Your expertise in data warehousing, SQL, Python, and ETL will contribute to the success of cross-functional projects, and your ability to thrive in technically challenging situations will ensure high-quality deliverables within set schedules.
Key Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain data solutions that align with cloud architecture principles and emphasize scalability.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and understand data requirements, ensuring effective communication of technical concepts.
• Utilize your strong data warehousing knowledge to design and implement robust data storage solutions.
• Employ advanced SQL and Python skills to create efficient and optimized data workflows.
• Develop and maintain ETL processes using various tools to ensure data integrity and reliability.
• Contribute to data modeling efforts, enhancing the accuracy and effectiveness of data representation.
• Leverage cloud data technologies such as AWS Redshift or Databricks to enhance data processing capabilities.
• Utilize your problem-solving and debugging skills to address technical challenges as they arise.
• Work closely with the cloud team to integrate data solutions seamlessly within the AWS environment.
• Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality.
Key Requirements:
• B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
• 5+ years of practical experience designing and building data solutions in a commercial setting.
• Strong grasp of data warehousing concepts and best practices.
• Proficiency in advanced SQL and Python programming.
• Extensive experience in ETL processes using various tools.
• Preferred experience in data modeling techniques to ensure effective data representation.
• Familiarity with cloud data lakes, particularly AWS Redshift or Databricks (preferred but not required).
• Previous exposure to public cloud environments, with AWS experience being advantageous.
• Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate across teams.
• Strong problem-solving abilities and a knack for debugging technical issues.
Location-Remote

Job Description:
Job description
Skills Mandatory:
MSBISSISPower BISQLData Warehousing

Immediate Joiners Preferred

We are seeking business intelligence analyst who needs to meet the end to end business analysis and reporting requirements using the BI tools. Analyst will functionally report to global Engineering and Product Line Management (PLM) teams and need to create Qlik sense dashboards as required for monitoring of accurate business performance.

Need to engage with multiple business functions mainly Engineering, Sales, PLM and Operations.

Job Responsibilities:

- Providing end-to-end solutions on data analysis and reporting.

- Perform detailed analysis of source systemsdata and developing data models.

- Write complicated yet efficient SQL queries and stored procedures

- Developing, testing, debugging QlikView Qlik Sense applications.

- Work with cross functional teams globally; gather and translate business requirements appropriately to build the required BI dashboards.

- Management and maintenance of all Qlik sense dashboards including enhancements as required

- Need to develop Qlik sense dashboards independently and assist other data analysts in the team to meet various business requirements.

- Liaison between functional business users and IT teams as required.

- Act as SME's and support business users on their queries including performing trainings for users globally as required.

Basic Qualifications:

- Qualified Bachelor in Engineering (any stream).

- 2 years to 5 years of experience in Business intelligence roles.

- Hands on experience in QlikView Qlik sense BI tools is mandatory.

- Experience in other BI tools desirable - Tableau, PowerBI etc.

- Competency in writing complicated SQL queries.

- Superior written and verbal communication skills, with a keen ability to effectively and professionally communicate at all levels (internally and externally).

- Exposure to Automotive industry desirable.

Traits we seek

- A good communicator, open for challenges, explores full potential to achieve goals.

- Team player who actively collaborate and contribute to achieve the team goals. Highly motivated and help the team to achieve the goals together

- Self-driven and strong passion in achieving results. Highly accountable for the actions and act as owner.

- Problem solving and analytical thinking, curious to learn continuously and believes in self-development.

- Go getter and passionate to travels extra mile to bring as part of continuous improvement.

- Creative in thinking, innovative mindset and does not settle for less.

Job Description:
Job description
Are you a talented and experienced frontend developer with a passion for education? Do you want to join a dynamic team of professionals who are committed to transforming e-learning resources for students and parents across the United States? If so, we want to hear from you!

We are seeking a Senior Frontend Developer to lead our team of frontend developers to deliver high-quality, bug-free code that meets the needs of our e-learning platform. In this role, you will be responsible for coding, reviewing, and managing a team of frontend developers to ensure the highest standards of code quality and performance. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand and define user requirements and develop effective frontend solutions that engage and inspire our users.

Responsibilities :

- Lead a team of frontend developers to deliver high-quality, bug-free code

- Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code that meets the needs of our e-learning platform

- Conduct code reviews and provide feedback to ensure the highest standards of code quality

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and define user requirements and develop effective frontend solutions

- Stay up-to-date with emerging frontend technologies and industry trends

- Mentor and coach junior developers to improve their skills and knowledge

- Help to build the frontend development team by participating in interviews and making hiring recommendations

Requirements :

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field

- At least 8 years of professional experience in frontend development

- Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related frontend technologies

- Minimum of 5 years experience with popular frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js

- Familiarity with backend technologies and RESTful APIs

- Prior experience working on e-learning platforms

- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills

- Strong verbal and written communication skills

- A team player who can collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams

Attributes :

Passionate about frontend development and delivering high-quality code

Ability to work effectively in a team environment

Positive attitude, excellent communication skills, and a strong work ethic

Strong leadership skills and the ability to inspire and motivate team members

Results-oriented mindset and a commitment to achieving the best possible outcomes for our customers

Our team is passionate, dynamic, and committed to transforming education, and we are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer who shares our values and vision.

In addition to your responsibilities as a Senior Frontend Developer, we also want you to help us build our team by participating in interviews and making hiring recommendations. Your expertise and insights will be critical to our success as we continue to grow and expand.

If you are a talented and passionate frontend developer with leadership experience and a results-oriented mindset, and who can collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, we encourage you to apply today and join our mission to transform education!

Job Description:
Job description
We are looking for programmers with a keen eye for design for the position of front end developer. Front end developers are responsible for ensuring the alignment of web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency, and maintaining brand consistency across all web pages, among other duties.

Front end developers are required to work in teams alongside back end developers, graphic designers, and user experience designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. This requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Front End Developer Responsibilities :

- Determining the structure and design of web pages.

- Ensuring user experience determines design choices.

- Developing features to enhance the user experience.

- Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.

- Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones.

- Building reusable code for future use.

- Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.

- Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.

- Maintaining brand consistency throughout the design.

Front End Developer Requirements :

- Understanding of key design principles.

- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Angular.

- Experience with responsive and adaptive design.

- Good problem-solving skills.

- Excellent verbal communication skills.

- Good interpersonal skills.

Job Description:
Job description

Position: SAP ABAP Developer
Experience: 4 - 6 years 
Role: Permanent
Location: Chennai
Qualification: Graduation
Mode of work: Work from Office
Notice Period: Immediate - 15days

JD:
As a SAP ABAP Programmer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining SAP ABAP applications with a focus on SAP Fiori development. Your expertise will contribute to the successful implementation and enhancement of SAP Fiori applications.
The ideal candidate should possess a solid background in ABAP programming (preferably OOABAP) with 4-6 years of experience, along with strong knowledge and hands-on experience in ODATA developments.
Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain SAP ABAP programs, reports, interfaces, conversions,enhancements, and forms (RICEF objects) in accordance with functional specifications and technical guidelines.
Collaborate with functional consultants and UX/UI designers to gather requirements, analanalyzeyse business processes, and translate them into SAP Fiori applications (ODATA developments).
Participate in all phases of the software development life cycle (SDLC) for SAP Fiori, including design, coding, testing, debugging, documentation, and deployment.
Perform performance tuning and optimization of SAP Fiori applications to improve system performance.
Provide technical support and troubleshooting for SAP ABAP and SAP Fiori-related issues and coordinate with cross-functional teams to resolve them.
Develop and maintain technical documentation, including program specifications, test plans, and user manuals for SAP Fiori applications.
Stay updated with the latest SAP ABAP and SAP Fiori technologies, tools, and best practices, and suggest improvements to enhance system efficiency and effectiveness.
Actively participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality and maintainability.
Academic and Skill Requirements: 
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
4-6 years of hands-on experience in SAP ABAP programming (OOABAP preferred).
Strong knowledge of ABAP programming concepts, including ABAP Dictionary, ABAP Objects, and BAPI/RFC integration.
Familiarity with SAP development tools and technologies, including SAP NetWeaver and SAP ECC.
Hands-on experience developing ODATA projects for FIORI applications.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment, with excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong communication skills, with the ability to effectively interact with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Interested jobseekers can share their Cv with us at: info@altvu.in
Best Regards,
Team Altvu.

Job Description:
Job description
Cloud Architect
About us:
We are international Multi-Cloud experts, utilizing the power of the cloud for smart digital transformation. With 5 sites over 4 continents around the globe, +450 experts, + 1000 customers, and +30 years of proven experience, our mission is to deliver the best Multi-Cloud service to our customers, accelerate their business and help them grow. As tech-savvies, To help our customers stay on top of their game, our teams are constantly developing new strategies and tools that will help them improve cloud performance, spend, visibility, control, and automation. Our cloud experts will make any digital transformation a quick, smart, and easy process.

Cloud Architecture relevant experience: 3+ years experience

Requirements:
Expertise with architecting solutions on at least one cloud provider of AWS, GCP and Azure.
Google Cloud Certified Professional Architect OR AWS Solutions Architect Professional
Hands on experience on Linux, networking and storage administration.
Expertise on networking and security best practices.
Expertise with cloud specific monitoring tools as well as open source tools such as Prometheus.
Should have excellent communication skills.
Good to have:
Good knowledge of DevOps tools and processes such as Jenkins, ansible etc.
Expertise on Kubernetes, Docker and related tools and technologies.
Good knowledge of databases and database tuning.
Roles and Responsibilities:
The Senior Cloud Architect will be a hands-on person helping our clients build solutions on public clouds such as GCP, AWS and Azure. The architect will be required to design, build and help maintain cloud based solutions. The architect will help create processes in place for maintenance and optimization of client environments.

The architect will also have to participate in pre-sales calls with the sales team.

Job Description:
Job description
Required Skills:
Extensive experience in Embedded C/C++ based firmware development.
Experience using Embedded RTOS (FreeRTOS, RTX, ThreadX, VxWorks, Integrity, uC/OS, etc).
Experience working with Embedded processors and microcontrollers, preferably ARM.
Experience working with Peripheral buses (I2C, SPI, Serial, PCI).
Experience working with Device IO (Serial, USB, Ethernet, Wifi, Bluetooth, Zigbee).
Experience working with Analog and digital sensors.
Adequate knowledge of reading schematics and data sheets for components.
Ability to quickly learn and adapt to the existing code base and new technical skills.
Highly motivated with demonstrated ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
Have a command of software engineering fundamentals and modern SW development processes.
Strong analytical skills to be able to translate the system requirements and use cases to detailed system design.
Strong problem-solving skills to participate in troubleshooting of issues with different teams to drive toward root cause identification and resolution.
Good team player with excellent communication skills, to be able to collaborate and work with cross-functional teams.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic work environment with a focus on technical excellence, and responsiveness to meet timelines.

Preferred Skills:
Basic understanding of embedded hardware/electronics, schematics, and PCB.
Experience with Medical domain firmware development.
Experience with unit testing and static analysis.
Experience with a variety of debugging tools like JTAG, Signal Analyzers, etc.
Experience in using measuring and monitoring electronics test equipment like multimeter, digital oscilloscope, etc.
Familiarity with Requirements management tools, configuration management tools, and test management tools like Git, TestRail, Jira, Helix/TestTrack, Confluence, etc.

Responsibilities:
Designing and implementing software for embedded devices and systems.
Designing, developing, coding, testing, and debugging system software.
Develop associated tools to support testing and verification of products.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the product specifications, software requirements, software design, etc.
Responsible for documenting and implementing processes for software development.
Responsible for continuous improvement of software and processes to enhance efficiency, stability, and scalability.

Project and Risk Management
SPICE focus on all SWE & SYS processes
Engineering offshoring experience, ability to work with international distributed teams
Software development, planning and monitoring
Agile methodology
High capacity of synthesis for technical issues
Problem solving attitude
Atlassian Suite (Jira, Confluence) knowledge
Advanced written and spoken English
French, Japanese and German Optional
Main Activities/Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for work for SPICE SWE.2 for a given SW product
2. Take care of the Software Architectural Design (SWE.2)
a. Develop and document the software architectural design that specifies the elements of the software with respect to functional and non-functional software requirements.
b. Allocate the software requirements to the elements of the software architectural design.
c. Identify, develop and document the interfaces of each software element.
d. Evaluate and document the timing and dynamic interaction of software elements to meet the required dynamic behavior of the system.
e. Determine and document the resource (ROM, RAM, Flash ) consumption objectives for all relevant elements of the software architectural design on the appropriate hierarchical level.
f. Evaluate alternative software architectures.
g. Ensure consistency and bidirectional traceability is established between Software requirement and the software architectural design.
h. Communicate the agreed software architectural design and updates to software architectural design to the product construction group.
3. Organizes task forces and participates actively in critical issue on Architecture to solve technical problems and propose corrective actions
4. Supporting Feature Owners and Product Construction teams for the project in specific SW Architecture activities.
5. Propose relevant technical solutions for future SW Component.
6. Communicates with peer in the SW entity and shares best business practices
7. In time and in budget
8. To the state-of-the-art available technical knowledge
9. Fully documented to Company standards and SPICE Level 3

Job Description:
Job description
Responsibilities:

A day in the life of an Infoscion
As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to actively aid the consulting team in different phases of the project including problem definition, effort estimation, diagnosis, solution generation and design and deployment
You will explore the alternatives to the recommended solutions based on research that includes literature surveys, information available in public domains, vendor evaluation information, etc. and build POCs
You will create requirement specifications from the business needs, define the to-be-processes and detailed functional designs based on requirements.
You will support configuring solution requirements on the products; understand if any issues, diagnose the root-cause of such issues, seek clarifications, and then identify and shortlist solution alternatives
You will also contribute to unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers.

5+ years of experience in Performance Testing Life Cycle activities

Responsibilities

A day in the life of an Infoscion
As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to actively aid the consulting team in different phases of the project including problem definition, effort estimation, diagnosis, solution generation and design and deployment
You will explore the alternatives to the recommended solutions based on research that includes literature surveys, information available in public domains, vendor evaluation information, etc. and build POCs
You will create requirement specifications from the business needs, define the to-be-processes and detailed functional designs based on requirements.
You will support configuring solution requirements on the products; understand if any issues, diagnose the root-cause of such issues, seek clarifications, and then identify and shortlist solution alternatives
You will also contribute to unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!
